I don’t expect my workout tights to last more than a year or two because they all start to stink, pill etc. I can’t comment on this. What I do know is, I feel like I’m naked and that is the most important thing to me. Flattering and comfortable. These workout crops are both of those. I love them. 140lbs, 5’7” and 6 fits great.

I got these joggers about 3 months ago and they were love at first slip on. Nice and comfy and I even sized up for extra comfort because they wonderful sale woman told me they ran small. Sadly after a month they started pilling. I figured, it's okay I can deal with a little and I love the pants. But after 2 months of owning the pants they started pilling EVERYWHERE. Not just a little between the legs, I have pills on my rear end, on the knee, and on the calf. I have only washed the pants once according o the instructions provided by Lululemon and have worn them sparingly because I want them to last a long time. It sucks that at $98 I can only wear them for a couple months and have to limit my usage.
I'm obsessed with these! So comfortable and I love how they look and fit. I'm 5'5", 135 lbs, and I got my normal size 6. They fit perfectly!
These align joggers are great for on the go. I have them in every color and in the woven too. I wear a size 2 and the fit is perfect. They are comfy for travel.
Do your self a favor and buy these joggers.
This order was wonderful! I’m so glad I ordered this and it wasn’t a waste of money either! I felt like this order just changed my life!!

These are the comfiest pair of joggers or even just pants in general that I have ever worn. I want them in every color!! They are just like the align pant 28” but they fit slightly looser for a comfier fit. You can wear these to bed, or even just going around town running errands!!

I read that Align pants tend to have pilling on them. I own the crops in the Align and never had that big of an issue with the pilling. These joggers however are ruined after only two wears. I am very disappointed :(
Size up if you are endowed. Great feel but if you want something other than yoga pants, size up!
Love the align fit combined with the casual jogger look. My new favorite pants!

Incredibly comfortable, soft and well-fitting. Flattering to those of us with wider hips, and no gaping at the pockets. Definitely size up - I'm normally a size 8 (5'10", 150 pounds) and a size 10 fits perfectly.

Purchased a few pairs for postpartum wear and was saddened by the lack of quality behind this product. I wore these joggers around the house, doing simple chores and caring for my newborn - well within a couple of hours the piling was ridiculous. Given what I paid, it is making me rethink all future lululemon purchases which makes me so sad as I have been a loyal customer for may years :(
So so soft and comfortable, I never want to take them off!

I bought these joggers recently in a lighter color.. they were super cute and comfortable. After the first time wearing them, there were runs in the material.. not from being snagged or anything of that sort. The material just wasn't good quality and it's very unfortunate as they were very cute. Would not purchase again and would not recommend.. at least in lighter colors.

I am absolutely obsessed with these pants! I coach PE, and they’re perfect for looking out together, being able to move, and not being tight like leggings. I size up, and the fit is perfect. No issues with pulling, but I have tons of align fabric pants and only wash align fabric with other align fabric on gentle.
More colors, please!

Best pants Lululemon has EVER made!! I’ve purchased every color and some extras. I absolutely love the fabric, fit and look. I get tons of compliments and people asking me where to purchase. I love that they have pockets and are great for traveling. You will not be disappointed with purchasing these, it will make you just want to order more!!!

I love the design of these pants!
They definitely look like leggings from the waist down to the kneecaps and then they turn into jogger pants from the kneecaps down to the ankles. Very comfortable and innovative.
For a looser jogger look, size up.
Note: Color on the website is not always accurate. Graphite Purple is darker than it appears online.

In the first 2 weeks of owning these I would have given them a 5 star rating. I absolutely love the fit and the softness of the fabric. However, within the first month of owning them they started to pill and now they're not only pilled but they have also lost all of their softness. They're so scratchy that I barely wear them anymore. I'm so disappointed because they were my favourite pants, I told everyone to go out and get a pair. I did read the reviews beforehand and so took extra care to gentle wash on cold in a lingerie bag, but it still didn't help. If you made them in a more versatile fabric I would definitely buy more!
I absolutely love these jogger pants. I bought one pair then quickly ordered all the other colors and cleaned out my closet of any other type of sweat-pants. I could wear these every day.

I'm a huge fan of the Align leggins, so I had to try the joggers. They are cute and comfortable for casual wear. I don't wear them to work out. I purchased the same size I wear in the leggings and they fit great! Had to get a second color.

I was very excited to wear these pants because of the style and pockets. However, after my first couple of times wearing them, they began to pill. Sometimes pants pill when they rub against each other especially at the thighs but these were pilling at the pocket and other random places. I still enjoy the style but it's very disappointing and until the pilling gets fixed I would not recommend getting these pants, especially at this price point.
Love the fit of the size 2. Wore it to a casual cocktail party, and yoga class. The rise was a bit high for me as I am petite. Will wait to see how it launders.

These joggers are soft and comfy, but I did exchange them for another style because I wanted joggers that were a bit looser than tights. The align joggers fit very much like tights that are a bit loose. They felt great, but I wanted a different kind of fit. I still may get a pair of these someday.
Love these joggers. Comfortable and stylish enough to look good and feel good on the go. More colours please! Would really like them in camo print!!!

These would be the perfect joggers if they didn't pill after a couple washes. I only washed them with other lulu pieces and hung to dry each time. except for that which is very disappointing they fit perfectly, are comfier than sweatpants and look amazing! I hope lulu fixes their quality soon
I am quite upset that the first pair of Lululemon pants I bought started to pill, even if it is expensive. They really are comfortable, but I am upset at how it seems like it will tear soon.
I am loving these joggers- so comfortable and perfect for dance! The black is a soft black. I love the fit!

My daughter showed me your joggers n bought in different colors.
Well I felled in love with them n bought them in different colors also. I don’t have hips so they are a little full at the sides. I wish I could taper them.

I bought these pants on 5/22, and it is now 5/24. When I first tried these pants on I was in love! They were tight in all the right places, but also loose where you would expect to a jogger to be. Yesterday was the first day I wore them and they felt so great, so good that I wore them again today. However, today I felt like I was pulling them up all day and they even looked kind of baggy. Super sad about this.

These are so comfortable and soft, they sit on a great part of the body and are gorgeous feeling. However, quite literally on the second day of me wearing them they were pilling on the inner thighs and hamstring area. Very disappointing, since I was raving about them on day 1. Also disappointing that they are $100 and lost their value on day 2.

To start, I've never taken the time to review any of the 30+ items I've purchased from Lulu over the years. However, I regret purchasing these joggers so much I felt the need to warn others.
I spent the last few months looking around for a cute pair of black joggers that were flattering for casual wear. I was excited when I came across these. The first time I wore them they were comfy, but a bit bagged out after a couple of hours. However, I wore them for a second time today and, after three hours of wear, they are mysteriously pilled down the front thigh area and bagged out.
I don't mind spending $100 on a pair of pants, but it's annoying when the pants look old and worn immediately after purchase. No pun intended Lulu, but these are a lemon.
Best pants ever. Super comfy and soft. Love the naked/no compression feel.

When I tried on these pants I thought they were amazing! Very comfortable, very cute and SO SO soft! But after my first wear I realized the softness was too good to be true. The first time I wore them was on an overnight flight. When I got off the plane I realized the bum had become completely pilly and bally. Very disappointing that these pants couldn't even hold up for 12 hours :( I have washed them since and everything else seems fine other than the pilling on the bum.
These joggers are incredibly comfortable. Love them!!

So these are absolutely amazing when you first put them on - soft as can be and super flattering. Unfortunately they can't be worn for any period of time or activity without losing their shape and piling.

The align joggers (both lengths) are my favorite lulu product, other than the regular aligns. They are so comfortable! Also not bulky like regular joggers. I have them in a size 4 for a more relaxed fit, then got them in a 2 when saw them in WMTM and they were out of 4s. Both work really well and I feel like it puts me in a great mood just to put them on!

I'm not crazy about joggers but that changed with this pair. I love the feel and fit of these so much I purchased an additional pair shortly after the 1st pair and I'm considering a 3rd. I wear these to work, the gym and yoga class. I sized up one size for comfort. Worth every penny!

These are the most comfortable things I own. They are so soft, and I love the fact that they fit perfectly without a drawstring, making them more flattering. The only downside is that I've heard that they can't be washed with cotton. Still, it's definitely worth the inconvenience.

The nulu fabric is great and the fit was great at first but after several wears the waist and hip area and stretched and they aren't as sleek as I would like. I sized up from my align legging per the sales associate suggestion but now I am thinking I should have stuck with my regular align size. For reference I am 5"2 and 115 lbs size 2 in align leggings and a 4 in most other leggings and shorts. I ordered these in a size 4.

Recently purchased the align joggers and after the second wearing the side outside thigh area became all pilled. I am sooo disappointed as I thought I had found mt new go-to pant to go from classroom teaching to teaching yoga without having to change. The fit and feel of these pants were perfect for me.
Love these! Dress up or down. Perfect for a workout or running errands.
I liked the fit and style of these pants but decided not to keep them because the material seemed so thin and cheaply made. I can’t justify the price for a product that feels this low quality.

I got these joggers and loved them at first, but after just one wash with following the wash instructions, they began to pill like crazy! The material seems to become thin over a short period of time of wearing them. Very disappointed in the quality for the price I paid for them.

I love these joggers so much and I only wear them for lounging purposes at home occasionally. But even after wearing these so gently, it still pilled at the lower leg area (not the crotch or anything above the knee). I'm so sad since they look kind of old now :( I still love these pants but for the amount that I paid, it's not worth it to have it start pilling after only a few wears...

Ok so I was like a lot of you looking through reviews to see if these joggers were worth the money. I read many mixed reviews, most negative, but after wearing these joggers I can assure you they are amazing. They are perfect for lounging, working out, and even work (I work as a bartender and they are super comfy for long shifts). I typically wear a size 6 in Lululemon leggings, but I sized up to an 8 and I'm glad I did. The 6 fit, but they were more like loose leggings than joggers, so sizing up gave me the jogger feeling. They're super comfy and very stylish for running around town, so I definitely recommend!

I was really looking forward to trying these pants and when I first tried them on, they were very soft and comfortable. After wearing them once, washing and air drying, there was significant pilling across the back and sides of the pants. I also bought the align crop tights and am a little afraid to wear them for the first time. Love the idea for this product but hopefully a more durable material will be used in the future.
I wear these almost every day. So comfortable and soft.
I love these pants so much, they are sooo buttery soft! I just wish they came in more colors
These pants have changed my life - working in production they are super flattering, have pockets and help when running around!
Best pants ever! So comfy would have a pair for everyday!

Love these joggers! I was looking for something similar to the align pant material, but in a jogger style to wear and feel a bit more comfortable outside the gym and when traveling, and these are it! They're so soft, comfortable, tailored nicely for a jogger, and best of all are high-rise. I've been looking for a high-rise jogger, and y'all nailed it. I suggest making all pants high-rise!! Way more comfortable and flattering on a wider hip lady. ;)

I received these pants as an accident-- I did not receive what I ordered in the mail. I was at first excited because they are luxurious and soft. However, within the first day of wear, the material is already pulling. I have a wide range of lululemon pants and leggings, and I continue coming back for their incomparable quality. This purchase experience has been the exact opposite-- not receiving the item I ordered, and feeling disappointed in the item I received.
These are the best thing to happen to me! Lulu does no wrong. Comfy and breathe-able.

Best ever pants! So comfortable and soft and lightweight! Love NULU fabric! It’s thinner softer and lighter then Luon, that is perfection for summer. I wouldn’t make a statement ‘runs small’ but I bought those a size up for looser fit and longer length. For the reference I am 5’2” 108lbs and normally size 4 in my Lulu pants, but preferred size 6 in this one.
I like the idea and as you know already your legging does have good fit, however this one is too thin to wear anything under, you can see your skin color through the pants.

When I first got these joggers I thought they were so amazing. Soft and form fitting is all I need. Now after a month of wearing them no more than twice a week they are stretched out and baggy around the butt. It looks so unflattering and it's sad that these didn't even last a month.

I thought these would fit much better than how they did. I’m pretty disappointed in how they fit as I feel like they have had different reviews and some were positive. I wouldn’t recimmend these I wish I’d chosen the align jogger crop :(

The best of both worlds. Joggers and super soft yoga pants = heaven!
I can wear a 4 or 6 in LLL pants, I got these in a 6 and they fit great. I did try the olive and the navy colors, I found the olive to be a little tight in the crotch, maybe it was the seam that made it look weird. The olive went back, and the navy are my new go to lounge pants.

I bought these in two colors, the black and the purple. Love both of them and then went and got the cropped version as well. My goodness, where do I start? The fit is so perfect and the softness of the fabric! Then the way the waist is super high and is very flattering. These are my new go to pants!

I fell in love with these the minute I put them on but after reading the mixed reviews and the warnings I received in the store while I was purchasing these, I waited several months before writing my review. I absolutely love the way these fit and feel. Hands down, the softest, most flattering joggers ever. At first, I only wore these on upper body days, in attempt to not be too hard on them and avoid pilling. But I loved them so much, soon I was wearing them on leg and spin day too (and to the grocery store and on business trips!). I have muscular legs and only a slight thigh gap so I was a little concerned that they might not hold up but I keep looking for pilling or weird wear and it just isn't happening. I have 2 pairs so far and will be purchasing more!
First, I normally wear align leggings in 4, but sized up to a 6 in these joggers. They were too fitted for a jogger in my regular size.

I fell in love with these pants in the store so had no issue paying 100 bucks for them. They are so soft and comfortable and fit great! (I also suggest a size up for a slightly roomier/non spandexy feel and look.) I am seeing pilling issues consistently on reviews so hoping Lulu is happy to return if this happens to mine.

I like the way the align jogger 28-inch pants look. They're fitted across the rear end, hold stomach in across the front, and are loose but sort of flowy looking in the legs, then narrow down to a cuff at the ankle. Others might like to wear them more fitted, but I ordered a size up for my preference for loose comfort. When I wear leggings that are tight fitting from waist to ankle, I feel the need to wear a long shirt or tunic to cover my rear end. With these, I can wear hip-length tops and jackets again. I like the dark colors best, black and navy. Sent back the French clay color. Looked dull like cement or chalk.

These are truly the best pants I've ever owned in my entire life. I've had them for like 2 months and they are already pilling and looking like I've had them for 10 years which really sucks because I love them so much.

I absolutely love the align joggers! Very light weight and it feels like you are wearing nothing! Perfect legging like feeling yet the baggier look of joggers. Overall you can not go wrong with this purchase! And you can get them at the cropped length too!

These joggers are soooo comfy and soft PLUS the figure it gives you...WOW! I wanted to love these but it started to pill not just in my inner thighs but also along the inner side of my knees and the cuff part after 3 wears. I hand wash my lulus with care too.. Expected the quality to be better for such high-end price, so disappointed.

Very unhappy with it. I purchased a previous one and love it. This pair is shorter and tighter than the first. They're uncomfortable and I don't like them. Since the first pair was good, I just washed these immediately and now can't return them. It's disturbing and frustrating. I've experienced this a number of times with your brand and feel like it's time to give up and go for a more dependable brand.

I loved these when I first got them, as a strong supporter of Lulu products I was so excited to purchase these. They were honestly my favorite pair of about 8 different products that I own. However unlike my other lulu's these have such bad pilling after the first few times wearing them. I follow the wash instructions and the quality is just so bad. Did I get a defective pair?

When I first saw these, I was skeptical. How could the original align pant be improved in any way, shape, or form? Well, let me stop there. Everything is improved in the jogger. I noticed the material on the align jogger (at least in the color black) is slightly heavier or at least felt that way so I did not feel uncomfortable wearing my VPL undies lol. I appreciated how much heavier the material of the fabric is on the joggers which makes them perfect for running around town - I would not use these or expect these to perform as a workout pant whatsoever but I LOVE It for on-the-go errands. The high waistband flatters/really makes the booty look great. If you have an XL bum like me it makes it look XXL while being tapered/slim around the thighs/legs creating an hourglass type shape. LULU, please make these in a dark pink/grey camp print and a cerulean blue/green/brown camo print. It's been a LONG time since I have bought a pair of LULU pants thanks to the price going up constantly, but this particular style knocks it out of the ballpark. Thanks lulu!
Love this fabric it is so soft and comfortable. Wish the pants had a long option.. I am 5’9” and wish they were a bit longer.

I just bought these pants two weeks ago in Vancouver while on a medical trip. These are super comfy, cute and fit great. I literally washed these pants once and hung to dry and they look several years old and have pilled and one of the seams is coming undone. I am very disappointed that I paid over $100 (with tax) for these pants. I am a runner and love Lululemon but this is just not acceptable.

I love these pants so much I have them in two colors, and would buy more! They are perfect for traveling or running around town-- very comfortable like the other align pants but have the cool factor of being joggers. My sister has even worn them dressed up with heels!
These pants are so soft and comfortable, but if you like a looser fit on the legs I would recommend a size up

I was getting mildly annoyed at first when my Align pants started to pile - even when I used them for yoga only, and followed the washing label care. It now appears to be common knowledge that these pants do that. It is disappointing because we pay $100 for these pants, but now I am upset because I have SERIOUS piling after a casual walk to and from a local market. How can a brand advertise an active lifestyle with their clothes do not hold up to a walk! I was carrying groceries back home only to find the side of my joggers roughed up. Are we supposed to stay in a bubble? As a mom of a 3 month old, it is hard to find clothes that make me feel good in my post-baby body. I have loved my align joggers, and align pants ( I own 3 and fear this will also be a waste of money!!) before pregnancy, during, and now afterwards, but after putting more than a thousand dollars (and that's just pants) at Lulu, I am now angry that the align pants fall apart like this. I have 3 pairs of the in movement pants, those hold up to spinning classes and I love them, so this is not a critique on everything, but specifically the align pants. Please please fix this or reduce the price so it is not so horrendous when these fail.

I was super excited for these joggers. They seemed flattering and very comfortable. Although they are just that they have a huge quality issue that I think lulu needs to address. I have worn my pants a total of 3 times for a few hours at a time and already the joggers look worn. Certain areas are already starting to pill and they attract lint like crazy. I expected so much more from lulu quality and paying a higher price for joggers. They are definitely not built to last.

As if the Align Pants weren’t perfect enough, the jogger came along. On days where you want pockets and that litttttle bit of flexibility, these are amazing. Slightly looser fit than the leggings, same amazing fabric feel, fully functional pockets, what else can a girl as for? Only recommendation would be to size down one size from what you wear in the leggings since they already are a baggier fit.
Looking for the perfect pair of joggers? This is it! The align joggers are buttery soft, I literally want to wear them every day. Hug you in all the right spots and look so flattering. 10/10!

These align joggers are the BEST. They are so comfy and stylish they go from gym with sneakers to out with flip flops, honestly u could out with heels and they pass for dressy joggers
I always wear a six in all lulu bottoms I sized up to an 8 to make the Legs a little bit looser. I love the look

I'm not sure why other customers have an issue with these pants. They have been my go-to pants for lounging around the house, running errands, etc. After 6 months or so of wearing several times a week, they're just starting to show some wear and pilling but they still have a lot of life left. They do have quite a bit of give, so if you're between sizes I would go down a size, otherwise just stick with your regular size. I have huge hips, especially in comparison to my waist, and I didn't have to size up - there's plenty of room. I haven't experienced any issues with stretching out. Also, just to note - I don't wear them for exercise, only around the house. They seem way too nice to wear to the gym and I feel like if I was doing burpees in these they would wear out pretty quickly.

When I bought my first pair of Align pants it was recommended to me by the fabulous associates that I should consider sizing down to a 2 from my typical 4 because of the nature of the fabric. This worked out great, and I love my align pant. The jogger is a different story. The size 2 is appropriately snug in the waist and rear but the way they ride up in the front makes them impossible for me to wear. I absolutely love the look of this pant, which is why I gave it 2 stars and not 1, and am trying to branch out to other pant styles rather than just leggings but this one is a complete miss.

I loved these pants initially! They were so soft and the fit was amazing, but I've been very disappointed with the quality. They pilled quickly all over the thighs, despite following the wash recommendations. I had recommended these pants to several people when I purchased them, but I would not anymore after seeing how poorly they've held up. Very disappointed in the quality given the price.
Love these joggers. Comfy and flattering.
I loved how these fit and felt but had pilling and weird abrasion marks after the first time I wore them. Not durable or long lasting whatsoever. Would not buy again.
Love them, want them in every color, would wear them every day if I could!
Pills first wear. No thank you.
Perfect fit, color and fabric!

Like all align pants, these are extremely comfy and feel like a second skin. I took the advice of others and ordered a size up. At the beginning this was a perfect fit. My issue now after about 3 washes (inside out, cold water, hang dry) is the amount the joggers have stretched out especially in the waist area. The waistband no longer sits flat across my stomach which is very unflattering. It bunches and gaps in the middle and it seems to be getting worse with time. If spending $98 on a pair of jogging pants I would expect them to last longer than a year? I have several other pairs of Lululemon joggers that still look new to this day. I cannot recommend this style, but if you do order, stick with your regular size.

These are super comfortable. However, they are $98. They pilled pretty bad which I expected the pilling since thats typical of the align pants. The bigger issue for me is that the waist completely stretched out. I have had these for about a month and have washed them twice and hung to dry. I don't understand how the waist is this big already. The waistband doesn't even touch my waist anymore just sits there awkwardly. Maybe size down?

I've had these joggers for a few months now and they are my absolute favorite! However, I am disappointed that they are already pilling. I am extremely careful with my Lululemon gear. I never dry them, and I keep them in pristine shape. For these to pill after 3 months is disappointing and I wouldn't purchase them again because of this.

The jogger is so soft and comfy, making me want to wear them all day long. With the being said, the material is delicate which requires extra care on laundry and the places you chose to sit on. I am around 5’ 2” so the length is long on me and bunch above my ankles which I don’t really care for. Hence, one star off. Overall, I recommend the joggers and can’t wait to wear them more during warmer months.

These joggers are the best when movements are minimal. I would not recommend this for working out because the pilling happens so quickly. I've had mine for less than a month and tried to wear it for working out and wrong decision ever. There's already pilling. Even the "butt cheek" area is pilling. The sizing is also a bit weird, size up if you want the loose joggers "look" but the waist will be bigger. I am size 2 in all lulu items, and I wear size 4 for my align joggers. I always find myself pulling the waistband as it doesn't hug my waist as promoted.

I loved these pants when I bought them, but 2 washes in cold water and hang-dries later, they are pilling and the threading is coming out. These are certainly not worth the price. It is a shame because I got quite a few compliments on them when I wore them.
Would not recommend.

These are the most amazing joggers I have ever worn! Maybe even the most amazing pants period. I was told by a friend to go one size up so they actually look like joggers and not leggings with a cuff on the calf, and I'm super glad I did. They are everything you'd expect and more! I love that I can wear them to work without feeling quite as exposed as wearing leggings, since they offer a touch more coverage on your butt. If you're on the fence-- buy these!!

A friend had these and they looked so cute on her so I thought I’d try them. I have muscular quads so they fit me a but more snug but still looked like joggers and are so comfortable, soft and functional. I can wear them out and about or for a yoga flow. I bought them in black and the wine color and really love them both. I even wore them to work! Highly recommend.

Hands down, my favorite lulu item. I didn't think it could get better than the align leggings, but I was wrong. I have these in black and I wear them at least a few times per week. They're perfect for errands, long days of studying, and yoga. I probably wouldn't wear them to a really hot power yoga class, but that's only because I prefer slicker materials (like luxtreme) for that. The fit is great - not baggy like sweatpants but not skin tight throughout like leggings.
Love these. Casual and so so soft. But, can be dressed up some and worn to work. Want alll the colors.
These have got to be the softest pants I’ve ever worn! The fit is perfect for both relaxing and training, so I’ve worn them almost every day since I got them.

Its a super comfort jogger
Not only for workout even can wear all day long
Amazing

I seriously could live in these pants, they are the most comfortable pair of lulu lemon pants I own. However (and this is a big however!) they pill so badly. I try to maximize wears before I wash them and I don't put them in the dryer, but they are really bad. It isn't even pilling between the legs, it is on the front of the pants in weird areas that don't get wear from walking, working out, etc. I'm disappointed that such comfortable clothing doesn't last/

I will preface this by saying this is my first ever purchase from lululemon. I bought these joggers a few months ago and they are the most comfortable pants I've ever owned. It is like wearing a soft silky cloud. I LOVED these pants. Which is precisely why they are THE WORST pants I have ever owned. I washed them twice and had worn them a handful of times when the pilling began. They are pretty much unwearable now because the pilling is so horrible. I expected alot better quality from this brand and for the price I paid. Sadly, thats not what I got. Do yourself a favor and don't waste your money. It isn't worth falling in love with these pants only to have them rip your heart out pill by pill.

I love the fit and style of the Align Joggers. I'm 5'4, 124lbs and wear a size 4 in the aligns. I would recommend that you size up if you're looking for a loose fit. I purchased a size 4 in the joggers and love the fit; however, the color I purchased was not flattering. I ended up returning them (French Clay color) and purchased the crop Align Joggers in true navy. I absolutely love them. Please add more of the true navy in the full length joggers.

Bought these align joggers in store. Unlike align leggings, these run more true to size, so I would buy your normal size/size up. Was very excited because they were very comfortable and I planned to wear them around the house/doing errands/etc. However, they began to pill after one wear. I have now worn them about 4 times and probably won't be able to wear them again because of the piling. I tried reaching out to the Lululemon via chat but was advised that these joggers are only meant to be worn for light wear for an hour or so. I am very dissappointed with these product and the customer service overall because it seems abnormal to buy expensive joggers to wear for one hour once in awhile. Would not recommend.

These started out very very comfortable and I was in love with them. They were soft and smooth and looked nice on. I have had these joggers for about 2 and a half months and am disappointed in them. These were my first pair of aligns and I was excited about them. Since these pants are over $100 after tax, I expected them to be good pants and worth the money. At this point, they have pilled so badly, the seams are fraying, and they look cheap. My mom and I each bought a pair and ours are in similar condition. We follow the washing instructions as well, so there really is no reason for them to be looking like they do, except for being poorly made. I wouldn’t recommend these because after a couple of months they begin to look old and cheap. I didn’t even wear these to workout in, they were just supposed to be a comfy pair of pants I could wear throughout the day. Do not purchase, spend your $100 elsewhere. I will not be buying another pair of aligns.
The joggers are exactly was I was expecting, more fit than normal jogger. They are also more comfortable than expected. My butt looks great!! I hope they will last for long

These fit true to size, are made of super soft material, and won me over as soon as I put them on. However, after only one cold wash on delicate cycle with similar fabrics, laying flat to dry, these pants have already started to pill! The pilling isn’t noticeable to others unless they are right up close, as I bought these in black, but for the price it was very disappointing. After initially trying these on I jumped online to order a couple other colors, but my original pair were already badly pilled by the time my new order arrived, so I returned the additional pairs. I’ll keep the original ones as I’ve removed the tags, worn and washed them, but I’m not sure I’d recommend these to a friend. Sad because for looks and comfort they’re easily 5-star; I rated lower because of poor quality/durability.
Loved at first but after a wash or two had a weird fit and is unflattering if you have any bit of cellulite.
So cozy and comfy! Perfect fit and and style! Please make more colors!

I live in the Align pant...I mean I think I have probably 10 pair and love them. So I was really really excited about the Align Jogger. I washed them on gentle in a garment bag and hung them to dry. Wore them twice and they are already snagged and pilling...and I didn't even work out in them! I am really bummed b/c they are probably the most comfortable pants I own but sadly, will not be purchasing any more and would not recommend them.

I had bought the Align Jogger in Black and absolutely loved them!! They are super comfortable and my new favourite everyday pant for work. (I am a PE teacher). So I decided I needed another pair in the Cassis colour. I am so disappointed. They have pilled everywhere. They look like a cheap pair of pants that I have had for twenty years. I even double checked the washing instructions to make sure I didn't screw up. But nope I didn't. I also tried to increase longevity by not putting them in the dryer. Very very disappointed

Fantastic! I love my Align leggings and now I love my Align joggers. I bought both a size up and my usual Align size, and I like the way they both fit. The size up tend to feel loose during activity, but are amazing anyway. I'm keeping both to have options. I am crossing my fingers Lulu can do a replen of more sizes and colors soon!

I bought these in black and love them so much. They are very comfortable and the material is so soft. I wear them all the time. I wanted to get another pair in a different colour, so when I saw French clay come out, I had to get them. The material feels slightly different than my black ones. They don't seem as soft, but still smooth and very comfortable. I did notice that the material is slightly see through. You cannot wear dark underwear with these - you will be able to see it! Other than that, I really like these pants.

I purchased these in the color French grey size 6 (after trying on a 4 and 6 in black and navy at the store). The four and six both fit fine, 4 offered a tighter fit while 6 offered a relaxed fit. I wanted them to be relaxed like joggers should so I got the 6. Let me start by saying the color French grey is absolutely gorgeous and if not for the issues...these would have been my favorite piece by lululemon to date.
Love these so much, I want more colours!! The French clay is beautiful. I wait for any black and white speckle combination too:) Thank you for these ones:)

Most comfortable pants I've ever owner honestly. 5'3, 126 lbs, bought a size 4.
These pants are not really loose like a normal jogger, but I ain't mad.

As a mom running around after my 1 year old, these pants are very comfortable and function well for me; however I was so disappointed that after only a month they began pilling badly. I am usually a big fan of Lululemon and have worn their products for many years but I wouldn't recommend these pants because of the quality. Paying a lot of money, you expect they will perform as their other products do.
I love the “align” products.. and these” jogger” style are great for not only working out, But a more flattering “sweat pants” for travel ect.

Similar to the Align leggings, I just expected more. So many of my friends told me these were amazing, so I splurged on them. Unfortunately, they pill SO badly even after just a few wears. I'm incredibly disappointed. I would expect to have these joggers for years at this price.

I only wear the Align leggings for yoga. I am obsessed with them. I love these joggers, but the underwear issue is the issue. What do people wear? When I wear a jogger, I do not want to wear a thong. I am trying to be comfortable. Anyway, panty lines are gross, so these pants are going back. Sadly.

My favorite lounge/yoga pant! I was a little worried about buying these after reading the reviews re: quality. I have not had any issues and ordered 2 colors (black and grey). They are my go to pant post pregnancy and couldn’t be more perfect. I have washed them 4 times on gentle cycle and hung to dry with no problems. Buy them now while you can!

I'm 5"1 and muscular in the thighs and calves. I typically wear a size 6 in shorts and a 4 or 6 in tights.While I was able to fit into both these sizes for these joggers, I decided to go with a size 4. They skim my thighs and calves, are not too tight, and give a very slim jogger feel. The size 6 was a little baggier at the knee area for me so I went with a sleeker size 4.

I am obsessed with the align leggings so I was so excited when these joggers came out. However, I am disappointed with these leggings. I have only worn these pants a handful of times and they already look worn out and faded. I also would not recommend these pants for taller people!

These pants are AMAZING. I am 5 1' and a little bit bigger in the thighs and butt, tried them on in the store and the 6 fits perfect and I didn't even need them hemmed! They are super comfortable and look great, very athlesiure stylish. I have them in navy which is a great neutral and will likely be purchasing another colour soon!
These pants are soo comfy! It’s like if my fav high waisted leggings and a fitted, soft jogger had a baby, that would be these pants. I want a pair in every color.

Went into the store and fell in love with those when I first saw them. I have the Align leggings already, so I trusted that those would be just as amazing.
I got home and was too excited to wear them on my trip, Took the tag off and wore them, when I get to the airport and looked in the mirror, I realized the major camel toe this gave me.
No matter how I adjusted them, it wouldn't go away. I thought I can maybe size up and just give these to my sister, so I went to the store a week or two later and tried on a size up, and they were just too big.
So I would say do yourself a favor and avoid the camel toe look.

These full-length align joggers are my absolute favorite lulu piece! They fit perfectly around the waist, not too tight on the legs and cinch comfortably at the ankle. I bought these in the teal a few months back and wasted no time when I saw them come out in black! My joggers are a size 6 and I typically wear 4 in lulu leggings and 6 in the shorts.

I don’t know how many joggers I tried before I bought these. They fit perfectly and don’t look slouchy while being amazingly comfortable. Perfect weekend wear. Like the others reviewers, I was really disappointed with the fabric quality, even after just one wash. At this price, they should be my favorite joggers for years!

I spent months shopping for the perfect jogger, and was elated to find these after trying them on in store last week. They are buttery-soft, the perfect length, and make your booty look amazing! Sadly, they wear out very quickly. After 5-6 wears, the pockets have started to bag out. I haven't been stuffing them full of anything heavy -- just my phone and earbuds to and from class. Also, the fabric is very delicate. It's already started to show some pilling and wear. I'm bummed because my Lululemon leggings have both been amazing and held up through workouts and wear, but these joggers don't seem to be made to the same standards. I would recommend them only for delicate wear, and advise purchasers to avoid using the pockets.

I bought the align jogger in early-mid Oct. after 5 months there is so much pilling and loose threads it looks like I’ve had them for years. I wash according to instructions and only wear on weekends. I love these pants and wanted more but for $98 I’d expect them to hold up longer than 5 months.

the pants are very comfy, fit well and soft. however the material is already pilling and I've only worn them twice. I'm disappointed considering the price is high. I personally would not recommend these because of the pilly fabric.

I love the fit of these pants! I finally found a cute, well fitting jogger.. However, I'm with everyone else on this one. The fabric is terrible. It starts to pill only after a few wears even when you follow washing instruction. Maybe its just me, but the fabric attracts lint and shows it very badly. I swear I have to lint roll these every time I wear them, and I don't even have pets in my house. Love the fit and length, but overall disappointed in the fabric quality.

I really wish I read the reviews before buying these pants. I have only washed them twice and hung to dry and they are already pilly. Lots of little balls of fabric on the knees and inner thighs. The pants look old and they are brand new. I actually cannot believe it because I have many other lulu pants that are 5 plus years old and they look brand new. It must be the fabric. I feel pretty disappointed because I love them but they just won't last or look good for much longer.

These joggers are the comfiest joggers ive ever worn...but the camel toe is beyond bad. I have thin legs that do not touch so this really emphasized the crotch situation. The joggers are so comfortable and I would totally buy another pair if they didn't fit so weirdly.

I love the pants and the fabric is great but I had the same problem as previous customers. The material starts to create little balls especially in the inner thigh area but also on the front of the pants as well. For as much as they cost they only stayed in good shape for about 3 months. Bummer... because I love them so much. I ordered the crops so let's see how long they last.

I bought the align leggins months ago and loved them, so when these came out I was so excited to buy them. Later on, my leggings started pilling, and soon after I received these, they started piling as well. It started in the middle where my thighs rub together but have spread to the front of the thigh. Also, I saw a workout person online recommend these and the fit on her was very loose, but when I got mine, despite the fact that I sized up to make them fit looser, they were still tight in the butt area and down into the thigh making them appear as a legging but a little loose in the knee area which looks very awkward.

I purchased these pants in black and they are the perfect lounging pant that still looks stylish. I wear them all the time! I do find however that the Align material is very hugging to the body and not very thick and thus shows every crease of your body. I do have to wear a shirt that covers my stomach to feel comfortable in these pants.

Please redesign these... maybe in a style like the On the Fly Pant?? The fabric is amazing but the fit is terrible! I ordered one size up from normal: 6... those didn't fit and were weirdly tight when I tried them on. Then I ordered an 8... and those were too big on the waist and still looked weird. Am going to return both pairs

bought in January of this year
complete pilled and faded after less than 5 wears
I was denied a return because item was "well loved" and not eligible for a return

I've had these pants for a little over a month now and I love them so much, except for the fact they are pilling. After only having them for a few days they started pilling and they have gotten worse. It looks like I have had them for a year.

I owned these already when they were the 'back in action' jogger and was thrilled to see them back as the 'align jogger'.. still the same great align pant with a little extra room and POCKETS!!! I love that they have pockets!! Hoping you continue to keep these as a regular in the shop!
You need these, buy them now! They are so flippin comfortable. I could live in them! Please come out with some better colors though. I really only like the black.

I've been on the search for a great pair of joggers for probably a good year and was eyeing these for a bit. I got my husband to pick up a pair for me from the mall, and was super excited about them! But after a few wears, I regret not listening to the reviews left on these. The quality is quite poor, and the fit is really strange. I find that the pants are a lot thinner than all my other Lululemon pants, and doesn't feel as durable. Sad to say that I'm extremely disappointed with these.

These joggers are so soft and comfortable I feel like I could live in them. I sized up so they didn’t fit like yoga pants with a jogger band at bottom- I wish they were the tiniest bit looser in the hip area. I bought them for travel, but I’ve worn them for errands, actual yoga, and dressed them up and worn to work!
Literally feels like you’re not wearing pants
These pants are great! Comfortable and fit perfectly. I sized up after reading the reviews and am happy I did, gave a little baggier look.
I love these! The fit of align with a more relaxed vibe. Perfect for out and about/school drop off or long walks. I’m not into them as gym wear though.
My wife loves these pants - specifically the fit and comfort. She would wear them everyday.

I don’t know why these have been getting such negative reviews. I wear mine a lot and there is no piling for me at all. I wash them with no fabric softener and hang dry. They’re so comfortable and fit great. I’m 5’4, 155lbs and curvy on bottom. I purchase 8s in the align crops and got an 8 in the jogger and they fit comfortbaly. Not too tight or too loose. I did up a size and down a size to see the fit. I preferred my normal size. They also come to my ankle. I would purchase and recommend. More colors would be great.

The worst purchase I've made from Lululemon thus far. As an avid lover of the align pant, I was super excited to see a new spin on it - but the quality is not up to par and they pilled all over after one wash (no dry). They're pilling all over the legs, not only on places where my thighs cause friction. Very disappointed and hope this can be resolved.

I was so excited about these pants when I first tried them on in the store that I had to buy them immediately. Fortunately they were the last ones in the store and they were my size! It was like it was meant to be, until I actually wore and washed them. I wore them ONCE to yoga flow and washed them on gentle by themselves as they were the only lulu items I had that needed to be washed, but when they came out of the washing machine they were so pilled on all the seams and even on a random spot on the back of the left thigh. The pants have held up fine since, mostly because I've been so scared to wear them as I don't want to ruin the fabric even more. I love these pants and think they are so flattering, but WHY are they pilling so excessively already?! This seems like a manufacturing issue as I have done everything I'm supposed to when it comes to care. Lulu quality has really started to disappoint me recently... such a shame because I don't know where else to buy athletic stuff :(

I bought these pants because my friends had recommended them. LOVED them and wore them all the time. I washed a couple times and around the second wash they started pilling. I kept wearing them because they are legit the perfect jogger and what I wanted in a jogger. I decided to return them because I had spent good money on these pants and didn't think the fabric should be doing this. Very disappointed and torn because they were my favorite pair of joggers.

I have worn these pants about 5 times and only washed them twice. They were so comfortable when I bought them and were definitely my favorite pair of lulu pants. Sadly, they have been pilling and the quality is becoming worse. I've never had a pair of lulu pants pill this badly this soon.

I call these my "dream pants" because they are literally the most perfect silhouette to dress up a little or wear every day. I love the fit, but the quality is poor. I've been wearing them for a little over a month and I am not impressed with how they've been holding up!! I wash them exactly how the instructions say and I still have pilling on the top thighs and butt area. I am very disappointed because I love the style of these pants!!

As a lover of the Align leggings, I was so excited to purchase a pair of these joggers. I loved the fit at first and went ahead and tossed the tag. As I wore these for a couple of days, I noticed how unattractively my pair bunches around the inner thighs. The waist band fits great (5'6'', 120lb wearing a size 4), but there is too much fabric in the inner thighs and front. They do not sit flat as they look in the photos. I have worn them a few times around the house and washed once, and I am already noticing piling in the thighs. I wanted these to be the perfect joggers and I am so disappointed!

I purchased these in melanite over the phone, they were delivered quickly from the store & the customer service was great. I really liked them when I put them on so I tossed the receipt. I have only washed them once & wore them around the house a few times over the past few weeks. They are already pilling. The quality is not there for the price. This was my first lulu purchase & I am not impressed. What a waste of $98

I ordered the Align joggers in black when they were first released in the fall and sized up two sizes based on other reviews and they fit well with enough give in bottom and thigh area to be a jogger rather than a legging. I am 5'3" and the length is perfect. I was so excited to see the joggers restocked and ordered the navy in the same size as my black joggers. Unfortunately, I think the navy will be going back. They are 1.5" longer than my black joggers (both pairs are full length, 28" inseam) and the fit is looser overall. I don't understand how the same pant can be so drastically different. That said, be careful for inconsistent sizing among colors and from first release to recent restock. Try on before taking tags off!! Very disappointed in this product.

So disappointed I had very high expectation for these joggers but the design of them gave me a camel toe type appearance where the seams connect around the crotch :( I am 105 lb's 5,7 and got my usual 2 they are too short but really what let me down the most was the overall design as the fabric doesn't seem to hold up to even a day of my long winter coat being next to it as they are already pilling...Adore the look of them just not them on me...

These pants! SO smooth and just comfortable to wear around the house. IMPORTANT: I typically wear a size 8 in all lulu clothes, I order size 6 in regular align leggings I ORDERED A SIZE 10 IN THE JOGGERS AND THEY'RE PERFECT. Not too tight around the waist and not legging tight on my thighs. I tired the 8 on in store and is was like a weird pair of leggings trying to be a little baggy but not.... so definitely order a size up. End point, these are worth every cent. I haven't tried this, but co-workers have worn them teaching a hot power flow class!

I love these pants, they are great for traveling and lounging in. I am only giving it 3 stars because I am so disappointed in how the material has held up. I have had these pants for about a month now and even bought another color in these, but they pill so easily. I washed them according to the instructions and even asked Lululemon employees how I should wash them (only athletic clothes, no towels, etc.) and I air dry them. They have pilled within the first few weeks of wearing them and although I love them, I can't wear them outside anymore because if the very visible pilling.

I would give this 5 stars for comfort, but less 1 star for the fit. This is like wearing tights/leggings but looser below the knee. The fit seems a bit odd as it gives sort of gives out a camel toe and a little tight on the bum, but if you size up, it is too loose! I am normally a 2 on the Align leggings so I sized up for this and it is super snug on the waist/booty area. That said, I decided to keep it as it is very comfy to wear and I'm loving the pockets! I have not noticed any piling thus far but despite the fit imperfections, I find myself grabbing this from my closet frequently. I recommend this if you go for comfort over style :)
It is more versitile than leggings. Love the pockets. Super comfortable. Make them CAMO please!

I purchased these along with 3 pair of Align 25" and have worn all 4 for only maybe a total of 4 times and they all are pulling on the thigh. I wear them for yoga and around the house and I am not rough with them. I feel this material should be taken off the line. It pulls when your grandchild is sitting on your lap and if I have to stay wrapped in a bubble to not get these 4 pair pulled then something is totally wrong. I am so very disappointed in the Align line. I do not recommend this to anyone unless you are willing stay sitting in one place while wearing them.

I was excited for these. I've been looking for a jogger with some form. A bit streamlined and not too baggie etc. These seemed like they would fit the bill. However, they fit a little weird. The top half of the pants are tighter through the thighs and loosen up from about above the knee down. It wouldn't have been a bad thing if they didn't ride up my leg into my crotch area. I have to pull them down every so often and I feel a bit self conscience. They are not forgiving around the butt area, they are tight enough to show everything but not tight enough to smooth you out a bit like a tights/legging. I want to try them in a size up but I don't know if that would help. I don't want to end up with another pair that I don't absolutely love for that price and you would only know if you wore them around. They look great at first try on. It's when you take the tags off and you actually wear them that you feel like you made a mistake on keeping them. Also, I have noticed a bit of wearing after a few wears and washes due to the type of fabric.

I love the fabric of all of the align pants, I have a few pairs of leggings and recently got the joggers but Ive only worn them a couple times and they are already piling so much!! Not sure if I would recommend based on quality but they are the most comfortable pants ever!

I love these align jogger and got 2 of each length. But after 3 or 4 times wearing, it's starting pilling off. I heard of this issue before but it's never happened to me. Although the comfy feeling, I have to take 3 stars off because of poor quality.
Very comfortable. Love the pockets. Lightweight but warm enough for cool weather.

I went into Lululemon to purchase new aligns, and was told to try out the jogger versions. I tried it on and the fit was okay at first; however, after the second wear, they started pilling a lot and stretched out a decent bit. They are now so unflattering to wear and I don't find myself ever grabbing for these anymore. A bit disappointing given the price. Should have stuck to the original aligns.

First off, I loooove the fabric used in the Align collection. Super soft, lots of stretch, great for lounging, running, lifting, etc. You name it, they work for it. The issue I have is that there is only one length, and since I am short (5’1”), they never fit quite as they should. So with these, the cuff fits around my ankle, but the pants bunch at the bottom and make them look big. But if I go down a size, the waist won’t fit. My hope is that lululemon will start making clothing in a “short” option like some pants companies, or vary the lengths depending on size. So great feel, not so great fit.
Love this jacket, it's warm and looks so cute. I love the purple.

Loved the Align Joggers so much I also bought them in the crop style as well:) the waste is so flattering and comfy without being tight and giving you muffin top. I wore them on a 14 hour travel day and they held up awesome! Defiantly size up. I wear a 4 in everything lulu and got these in a 6. My only beef if why does lulu never make enough? They sale them in the store in black and navy... but of course they were sold out in my size (always) and no other stores had them. So if you can find them in your size don’t wait!!!!! Buy them now! Awesome flattering comfy joggers!

These were my favorite pants for the first month I had them - good to wear just about anywhere and really cute (especially with a crop top!) but after a month they started to pill. If I hadn't paid nearly $100 for them I wouldn't mind, but I wouldn't expect something from Lulu to show wear so quickly.

These are my absolute favorite pants of all time! Immediately when I get home from work I put these babies on. They are like having a second pair of skin. I haven't had any issue with pilling and I own every single color of this collection. I suggest sizing up one from your regular align size for more of a jogger/baggier look. As with all aligns I only use for yoga and low impact activities. 110% recommend! Please make more colors!!!

I saw these pants online and couldn't get them out of my brain! They looked perfect for yoga, lounging, errands. I finally ordered them in the Melanite and now I want every color! These pants are buttery soft and super comfortable. I love the high waistband. I wore them to yoga and felt very comfy and flexible. I could definitely even dress them up a little with a button down or sweater for a chill Friday casual work outfit. I love that they have pockets (although my personal taste does not really like the way the pockets are seamed but I can look past it because the pants are that comfy otherwise). I think they fit true to size. I am 5ft2, 120lbs and ordered a size 4. Order these pants!

I honestly forget I’m even wearing pants when I wear these. They were a lot tighter in the butt than I had hoped. They fit like leggings until they get past my knees. I’m 5’5” 125 and got the size 4. So not what I was expecting but I love them in a different way. It’s like leggings with pockets so what’s not to love??

I was super excited to try these joggers on! The pair that I got in the mail TODAY: the fit was perfect, absolutely love look and fit but the pair that came in the mail already had fuzzies on the thigh area AND had loose thread on the seams, which has never happened to me. Maybe it was only my order but I am disappointed in the quality the pants came in.

I've tried to love these pants but I just can't. I love my align leggings so much, so I couldn't wait to order these. But they aren't comfortable & they ride up. I even took them into the store to make sure I had purchased the correct size, and the sales ladies assured me I had. SO much to spend on a pair of pants that just sit in my closet now! I am a loyal LuLu fan & I have never been disappointed in a purchase until now.

Love these pants! They are so comfortable and flattering. I bought a 4 and they fit a little loose in the legs and I like that. I am 5'5" and 103 lbs. I also like that the waist band stays were you put it. I wear these for casual wear and traveling not working out at the gym, but would definitely take the dogs for a walk in them.

The sizing is not usual... I am usually a size 4 in align pants and a size 6 in every other lulu pant. I ordered these online in a size 6, because I read reviews about it being a tighter fit and I wanted them to be a little looser fitting. I received them and the fit for my body was not good. I have a hips and a butt with a smaller waist (5'7 and 140lbs for reference). The pants were extremely tight in the legs and butt area... so I went to the store to exchange them for an 8. I tried on the 8 and they were massive in the waist. I ended up returning them because the sizes didn't work out. Sad that the sizing was not great, because I love the align pants. I would just recommend trying them on in the store.

I wanted to love these just by looks. I walk my dog early mornings and thought this would be a quick outfit starter. The fit is totally off for me. I’m slightly curvy, bubble butt... these were tight in all the wrong places and the fabric was thinner than I would have l liked or we just needed more of it. Would not recommend.

Purchased these pants two weeks ago, have washed them twice and there is already a lot of pilling. Mostly along the seams but I can tell they are not going to last long. Super comfy and look great but will soon be ready for the garbage. I really wanted to like these as they are one of two joggers that I like. I would not recommend these.

Okay so THESE ARE AMAZING. Please disregard all other bad reviews. I love the everything align, the leggings, the shorts <3 SO soft. SO comfy. Great alternative to when you don't want to wear leggings! They don't bag out even after multiple wears and they wash really well! I got my regular size 6! Also I'm ~5'5 and the length is great.

I really wanted to LOVE these pants, as they are super comfortable, however they are TERRIBLE quality. I follow all of the washing instructions, and take great care, but they still have pilled a considerable amount. While they are comfortable, the quality is subpar. Really disappointing, as I'm a huge fan of the align tights. Don't buy these if you want pants that will last you more than a few months.
Fabric is excellent—feels like second skin but structurely tailored to look sleek and reserved.

If you do not already have a pair of these, BUY THEM NOW; if you do, BUY SOME MORE! These are my favorite lounge pants EVER. Fabric is super soft. Fit is definitely your typical jogger fit -- size way up if you want them to be more loose like traditional sweatpants, TTS for your true jogger fit. The length is perfect -- slightly cropped if you are tall, full length if you're short. LOVE!

Bought these a couple months ago and have only worn them a few times and the piling has started. They are the most comfortable pants its a shame that they are already piling. Unfortunate that the quality has decreased especially in comparison to the cost for the item.

I bought these joggers, they are comfy, but pill like crazy. I air dry them too and have only worn them a handful of times. Wish they were of better quality for the amount you pay! I also took them into Lulu for an exchange and they would not do it for me :(, had the same issue with align pants, thought the joggers would be different since they are not as form fitting.

These joggers are amazing for comfort!! I bought these about two weeks ago and wore them 2 or three times, without even washing them the fabric was pulling and pilling on the thigh area. After one wash, cold water, hung to dry, they seemed way looser and too big. I was going to purchase another pair before this happened but not sure if I will now.. this really is too bad because I love the look and feel of them.

I absolutely love the level of comfort this jogger is giving me. However, the quality of this jogger isn't so great. After owning this pair less than a month, a couple of washes in a garment bag on delicate cycle, using cold water, no fabric softener, and lay to dry, wore it once for a walk outside and another for lounging indoor, the stitching on the waist are significantly unraveling. I realize this issue is easily fixed if I bring it to a lulu store that has a seamstress in-store. It's just unfortunate for the price and amount of wear, I already need to get it fix.

Bought these recently and only after a few wears the piling started. I have had them for a month now and unfortunately there is lots of piling. They are such cute pants but likely wont be worn outside of the house. Unfortunate that the quality has decreased especially in comparison to the cost for the items that are intended to be worn!

I bought a pair of Align joggers and a pair of Align yoga pants at the end of November 2018. Although, I love them both they have both started to pill and within about a month. The joggers are definitely worse than the yoga pants. They are soooo comfortable and I don't really want to return them but will now probably only wear around the house. I've only washed according to instructions and worn for light activities like walking or yoga. Pretty disappointing because at that price I would expect them to really last.

I own several pairs of the Align leggings and was excited to try the Align jogger. With the same great feel of the Nulu fabric, this style provides a looser fit in the leg and are the most comfortable, lightweight joggers I own. Please restock soon as I would love to order additional colors!

Absolutely in love with these pants. Just got them, the material is so soft, doesn't even feel like you're wearing pants! I especially love the loose waist. I went up a size for the extra room, as they are a jogger style pant. Would highly recommend.

I got my first pair of these a few months ago- LOVED THEM!! I even bought a second pair because I love them so much. However, after just a few weeks of wear, they began to pill. These pants pill more than $15 leggings from Marshalls. They're super cute and comfy, just know they are going to pill like crazy.
Versitile , comfy , flattering - loved so much bought 2nd pair
These are one of my favorite pairs of pants that I've purchased from Lululemon. I love the original align pants and these are a nice change up. Love the way they feel and look. Super comfortable!!

I was very excited to try these pants but I am extremely disappointed. They don't feel like a "jogger" at all to me and hardly different than the Align pant, that I love and adore, other than the pockets at the front and the cuffs. Unfortunately I cut off the tag and wore them so I cannot return. Missed the mark with a very high price tag.

I love these Align joggers I have slowly been adding more to my collection. I finally found my sold out size 4 in black and I am estastic. I wear a 2 in aligns and sized up to a 4 so they were a little more baggy in the leg. These won’t disappoint LuLu please keep these in stock.

These joggers are literally so soft and comfy. Was hoping they would be my go-to for everything, but after only wearing three times I have experienced SO MUCH pilling!!!!! I have followed the washing directions exactly and still have so much pilling. I am so disappointed.
Maybe they're a fluke and just my pair are like this?
These pants are amazing. They are Lululemon legging feel and material we love without the too-tight fit. I'll need another pair!
These are the cutest, most comfortable pants ever! I bought in black and maroon and wear them every single day!! I want in every color
Beautiful blue color, soft fabric, pockets keep hands warm...a must have!

I have had these joggers for 2 months now and they are still my go-to for everyday wear. The align material is so soft and comfortable. They are very flattering with the high waist and the V detail on the back. I still get compliments on them all the time! I usually wear a size 4 in the align leggings but I sized up to a 6 for the joggers for a looser fit (would recommend). Overall 10/10 - one of my favourite Lululemon purchases.

So I finally was able to snag these in my size in black. I am delighted with them. A bit thinner material than what I expected but they’re soft, and they fit extremely well. Love the pockets, the cuffed bottom and the material. I am a 10 in OTF pants and sized up to a size 12 and they fit as they do on the model; baggy in the leg and more of a jogger look. I don’t think it will be my last pair. Yay!

So excited to try the Align jogger only to be extremely disappointed when I received my order.
They are more like a legging than a jogger. Returning them ASAP

I love the style and material of these joggers. However I found the waist to be too big. I don’t mind the legs loose as they are joggers but the waist was too big. I did end up sizing down for a more snug fit in the waist and got the Align a Crop Jogger instead. But great style!

100/10 would recommend align pant. They are absolutely phenomenal anyone that tells you they’re not or writes a review trying to say they suck DO NOT believe them!!! The fabric is so soft. They do tend to pull a little bit but that’s really not a huge issue. For align pants I do suggest going down a size just because the fabric is so delicate or more thin it’s alot stretchier. Needless to say these are amazing, if you don’t have anything from Lululemom that starts with “Align” do yourself a favor and pick something up you will not regret. Worth every penny
Age: I KEEP MY AGE ON THE D.L.

Review_Text:
I received these pants for Christmas, and I WANT to love them so badly! They are indeed the super soft, cozy material you expect from Lulu, but I have only had them less than a month and there is already extreme piling on the inner thigh/crotch area. Im pretty disappointed considering how much you pay. Really have come to expect quality items and this doesn't meet the standard.
I have only washed them twice with similar fabrics (all my leggings/workout tops), and followed the wash instructions, and hung to dry.

I bought these joggers about a month ago and absolutely love them! The align material is so comfortable and the I love the red colour! The cuffs at the bottom make them the perfect 7/8ths length. I also love the V detail on the back of the waistband!

I am obsessed with the Align leggings, so when I saw the Align jogger come out I was beyond excited! These joggers did not disappoint — they’re just as soft as the Align leggings, with a waistband that’s just as perfectly high and forgiving. It’s also one of the first pair of joggers that hits the right spot on my ankle (most are too long and bunch at the bottom, as I’m 5’2”). I love how these joggers look so flattering (but still feel like “sweatpants”) and are tight enough to show off my lines — great for yoga and dance. The one thing that I’m not completely in love with is the pocket lining on the front of the thighs; it feels a bit unnecessary and sort of emphasizes the thigh.

Really like these and the material is nice. I bought the size 2 and for reference I'm 5'2 and weigh 103 and I like the fit and the 28in length. I first tried the cropped version but the entire fit was awkward so returned and got these 28in and I'm very happy with them. Only washed a coupled times so not sure how they will hold up in the long run but so far so good!

These pants are flattering, true to size (5'4", 128 lbs, athletic build), soft, and comfortable. Love them for wearing around town and coaching CF. But after two washes, following washing instructions, they began to pill significantly. Disappointed because I love everything about these pants - except the quality of the fabric. It just didn't hold up.

These joggers are the cutest and most comfy pair Lulu has made yet, seriously they fit and feel so nice! but they need to be much longer for tall girls! I am 5'10" and there was no bagginess to them which made them look goofy and not like joggers.

At first purchase, I LOVED these pants for their comfort and style. Unfortunately only after 1 delicate wash and hang dry, they have started to pill a lot. So sad, because I really love these pants. Soft, but they don't last long at all.
Favorite pants to wear running around or to lounge around. Great fit. Not too baggy or loose.
Bought these in many colors. I get compliments and questions all the time. Great for running around pre and post gym. Washes perfectly. Feels comfy to the body.

I am a die-hard Align lover, so when I saw these Align joggers were a thing, I had to give them a go. I absolutely love them. They are what I throw on when I want to wear sweats but want to look cute doing it. They are extremely flattering which helps :) definitely a new staple in my wardrobe.

I have been a fan of Lululemon since they first opened in our area. I loved them because they are incredible in keeping me dry and completely covered. But the pants and tights lately have been itchy due to the seams. I’m glad that I have plenty of the old ones that are perfect. Yes I have already returned all four of them. Align joggers and two different tights.
Absolutely love these! Incredibly comfortable and fashionable - definitely getting these in other colors!

I'm kinda disappointed in these joggers. After only 4 wears, minimal washes and very careful hang-drying, they're already starting to pill and snag. I bought two pairs of these pants and I wish I hadn't spent so much money because the quality just isn't there. I love Lulu so much, it pains me to write a bad review. The good news about these pants is that they're VERY cute on.
Perfect for yoga, running errands, or hanging around the house on a lazy Sunday afternoon
Great!
Age: I KEEP MY AGE ON THE D.L.

Review_Text: These joggers are the best. You could live in them! So soft and comfortable. Best jogger I’ve ever purchased from lulu. I would say to order up in at least 1-2 sizes if you want them to fit loosely.
These pants pilled at pockets after 2 washes. Going to send back. I would not recommend.

These joggers are so comfortable. My bf got me some lululemon stuff for Christmas and I was instantly in love with their products. These fit perfectly in all the right spots and are also the most comfy pants i've ever owned. My new go-to pants for everything but work.

These are amazing!! The first ones i ordered were actually sewn wrong in the inseam, they bulged out a little it was very strange, but i took them back to the store & had a new pair shipped to me. I usually wear a 2/4 in aligns, and had to size up to an 8 for these. You definitely want to size up to get that loose jogger fit. Love them! Just hoping they don’t pill too much
I thought these where going to be the most perfect comfortable sweats because the Align tights are soo comfy, when I saw these, I was like yesss!

Like the style and fit. Usually a 4 went up one size as recommended and glad I did. HOWEVER, have not worn them yet due to the spring/summer weight of fabric. Would have been happier with a variety of colors ...rather than the same old tired colors offered EXCEPT for the lavender shade which is great. Hey, think Red.
Age: I KEEP MY AGE ON THE D.L.

Review_Text: I sized down in these (typically a 4, bought a 2) because I wanted them to be a little tighter in the bum. Best decision! I love these. Comfortable, and stylish.

I have gone through a lot of lulu and these pants are amazing. They are extremely soft, comfortable, and the pockets are a great feature. If you are on the fence about these, just buy them and you won't regret it!

I LOVE my align leggings, so I figured I would give these a shot. I LOVE THEM. I did end up sizing up in them to give a little more room in the legs to give a real jogger feel, but honestly I don't know if I have ever loved a pant more. I try to wear them every single day! They look cute with a hoodie, a sweater, or even just a t-shirt!

I'm very disappointed! I bought these a few weeks ago & I have only wore them twice & I haven't washed them either! Already piling on the tops of the thigh. I would of never spent this money on joggers if I knew this was the quality I was getting.
I love the Align Jogger...super comfortable! Went up a size just like the other reviews for a slightly baggier fit. Perfect! I haven't had them for very long so only time will tell but, love so far!

I love the material! But the style of the pants don’t match the price.
They are very comfortable, but definitely in between house sweats, and something to wear outside/grocery store.
I am always an 8 in Lulu, and sometimes a 6. The 8 fits well, but isn’t as loose as a typical jogger pant.
LOVE having pockets!!! Super comfortable like the align pant.

For Christmas, I bought my three teenagers Lululemon joggers. The boys received ABCs and my daughter the Align. I took off the tags and placed them in white zippered laundry bags to wash them on delicate for the first time ( how we treat all of our Lululemon products because we have learned they last the longest this way). I hung them to air dry. My daughter went to wear them for the first time and we noticed a flaw across the front. Not sure if it was there from purchase, or that just happened in the laundry process, but regardless I’m very disappointed with the material and its durability.
Sized up to a 6 as suggested and I definitely agree. These are AMAZING joggers and I will absolutely get more - once my size and preferred color become available again!

Obsessed with these and haven’t taken them off. So comfy and so flattering. Perfect for running around all day, traveling, or just lounging. They run small so buy one size up! I’m normally a 4 in all leggings but I had to buy a 6 in the joggers. Must buy!!!
I love the softness of the Align legging, so I have been wanting a jogger. Fits very well on a petite frame. Length is great! I love them better than my leggings. Most comfortable jogger I have worn!
