The material is super soft. The fit is ok. I do love the pockets... but I have worn these a few times and they are starting collect lint, which is aggravating for the price. Im also disappointed in how thin they are, I personally prefer thicker material. Also go up one size, if your curvy maybe two if you want a looser fit. Im curvy 5’5” 130lb and I bought a size six, they arent to relaxed or baggy and also not to snug like a legginng.

Purchased the Align Joggers in true Navy. I’m 5’5”, 120# and bought the size four. They fit perfect and are so comfortable! The best joggers I own...and I have quite a few. I would recommend these to everyone!

The moment I put these on I loved them. They are so soft and fit amazing. I sized up like the reviews mentioned. I usually wear a size 6 in all my leggings. I bought a size 8 ( 5'2" 130 pounds). I find them lose but they still look flattering. Definitely will buy a few more pairs.

If you love the Align leggings, these are a must. Due to my big thighs I don't typically like joggers on me, but these, buying them in every color! I live in these. I wear a size 6 in align leggings, but sized up for a looser jogger fit and so glad I did. Must have staple!
Just as comfortable and soft as the Align pants. I could live in these pants! Need to purchase more colors!

This was already my favorite material and I'm so happy they came in jogger form. I've often found other joggers to be unflattering but I've been living in these. I'm 5'10" and I found the 6 to be a good length, hitting just above my ankle. I got the true navy and I'm definitely going to grab another color.
I never want to take them off! Fits perfectly, super soft and cozy, perfect to throw on after a training session or going to/from.

First of all, anything with the name align in it.. just sign me up! All of these pants are made with my favorite buttery soft nulu fabric. In my opinion lululemon- ya'll should really make more items in this material it is surely the best yet!
These joggers though are great! They're the perfect ankle length for me, with the lovely high waist, and just enough room for your legs but not too much making the item excessively baggy. With that being said, I did size up in these as I wanted them a little a little on the looser side, rather than stuck tight to my legs. These joggers are the best!

i was a little skeptical at first with buying these pants because they seemed to get mixed reviews but i am here to tell you that these joggers were the best decision ever! they are lightweight and legging-like with a slight jogger feel (super soft). i got them in my regular legging size (6) and they fit perfectly! they are great for causal wear and i’m sure they’d work well for working out as well. GET THESE PANTS!
I wanted to love these pants. However, despite how comfortable they were, they’re just not flattering and are extremely short. Would only recommend for people 5’2 or under.
As always, a good fit. However was hoping for a slightly heavier fabric.

I absolutly loved these pants they are so comfortable and look great! Unfortunately I have only had them for about a month and only washed them one time, hung to dry, and they are already pilling. I did not expect them to pill so easily and quickly! Sadly disappointed

I love, love, love these pants! When they first came out, I ordered a pair in each of the 4 colours. The fabric is so soft, the fit is great and they feel like you're wearing nothing at all. They move with me and, as a physical education teacher, they are my go-to pants for any type of activity. The full coverage gives me the confidence to know I can bend down, twist and jump without any "wardrobe malfunctions". For reference, I am 5'6", 120lbs and usually wear between a 4 and 6, but ordered the 6 and the fit is perfect. Slightly baggy like a jogger should be, but a tight enough fit for them to stay put and look great.
We bought them for my soon to be mother in law and she loved them. She is wearing them all around the house and to work tonight she says lol.

First of all, I own lots of Lululemon, the quality is what makes me keep purchasing more items. And this did not disappoint. I am 20 weeks pregnant and none of my pants are fitting, I was depressed and feeling fat in everything I wore. Until I met these! They are SO comfy, flattering, and are going to serve me well throughout my pregnancy! Just remember to size up as they do run small! My only fear is that when I am done being pregnant these won't be around to purchase in my normal size!

I had been looking at these pants for weeks, and finally decided to order them online only to see my size was sold out! Luckily, I was able to call a store that still had them in stock and get them sent to me. I got the black and they are SO cute and comfortable! Make my butt look great! I'm so excited to wear these to class next semester and still feel like I look put together, and to lounge in them at home. I got my normal size (6) and they fit great.

I truly love these pants, although a couple of things surprised me. For starters, the fit. The label “jogger” gave me the impression they would be looser fitting. While they are looser from the knee down, they are almost as tight as leggings from the knee up. If I ordered again I would go up a size for this reason. I was also surprised that the material is fairly thin. I was anticipating them being a heavier weight. They are going to be great for spring and summer. They are very comfortable and soft. Overall I am very happy with these pants!

These are my favourite lu lus every...so comfy + VERY flattering. Unfortunately they are already pilling and i only got them a month ago....haven't even put them through the wash. Very disappointed by this as they are still expensive pants + i want them to last! Usually lulu is on point for quality but this is not good!

I loved these joggers when I purchased them in a size 6 and told everyone I knew about them (several friends have also purchased them). They are the perfect comfy every day - running errands - but not leggings- pants, or so I thought. After a single wash, they are pilling a lot between the legs and the fabric is so delicate I can already see a few pulls. There are also already loose threads at several areas where there is top stitching I expected some pilling but this is far worse than my wunder unders. I take great care of my lulu lemon items, but these are hard to care for. Perhaps would have been better in the luxtreme fabric which I have never experienced an issue with.
These joggers are perfect! Had to buy in every color. You can dress them up for a casual dance teacher look or use them to work our in! Great fit! I’m 5’4 and wear the size 6.

Love these pants! They are a slimmer, more flattering version of last year's joggers. The waistband lays flat and they are a great length. They were snug so I did size up so that they had a more relaxed look.

I love these pants! Its super soft, feel is slightly velvetty to the skin. And very flattering in the butt. The pants can go very casual and can be worn w heels! Another reason why i love these pants! I got green initially and got black too!

I LOVED these joggers at first when I bought them. They were comfy, stylish, easy to wear down or dress up!! After a few washes, and wears, it is ALREADY piling!! I take very good care of my Lululemon products and Ive never had an issue like I do with these joggers. I agree with the other reviews that this product is very fashionable, but the material isn't my favorite!! Wish I knew that before purchasing.

I have and LOVE other Lululemon joggers but they are Rulu and a bit warm for Hawaii. The fit of the align jogger is amazing and they are so cozy and perfect for warmer climate. I did size up to a 6 as recommended and they are great. Even the full length is perfect for me and I’m 5’2.
These joggers are the best pair lulu has made since the base runner a few years ago. I would recommend sizing up. I typically wear a 4, and the 6 fits great. You will not regret this purchase!
I love align pants, and I LOVE these joggers! I found them TTS. I'm a size 4 in all lulu leggings (including align leggings) and size 4 fit me perfectly. I would not size up.

Just received my joggers they are amazing! I'm a huge fan of all of the align pants. They are the best line that Lulu has! I already want to order another pair. Please restock the green joggers soon :)

I absolutely love these. They are super soft and multi functional. I wear them to teach movement, train, handbalance training, lounging, to and from, everywhere! Most other joggers at every long on me. These are the perfect length for my short legs. I will be getting more colors!

i love the fit of these pants! not super tight like leggings, but still tight enough to hold everything in. the one thing i will say is that the fabric starts pilling really quickly - i've had these for just over a week and i have noticed pilling on the thighs and around the ankles. other than that, these are perfect!

I love these joggers. Not bulky or baggy at all and the material is incredible. I’m 5’6” 145 and usually wear a size 6 in the align yoga pants, but for these I sized up one size and they fit perfect. I wanted them just a little roomier since they are joggers. Don’t hesitate to buy!

I love this pant especially because the aligns are my absolute favorite! It is a high rise jogger with the same butt contour as the leggings the only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because it kinda rides up (camel toe) and I am not the biggest fan of the pockets they are super convenient but can are awkward
OMG these are fantastic !! The pockets, the feel, the length, everything. Love these so very much! I bought in my normal size which I thought would be too tight but it was perfect!!

Saw another review about a hole in these pants but decided to order them anyways.. took them out of the wash a week after i bought them to find a huge hole on the side of my leg. Can't wear them anymore so overall just wouldnt recommend!

I am obsessed with the Align Pants and the amazing Nulu fabric that they are made of so I figured I would give the Align Jogger a try! I love them! I needed something that I could lounge around in that was not as as tight as leggings, so they are perfect! I am usually a size 6 in Lululemon clothing, but I sized up because they are a bit tight around my calves and I like a nice looser fit. I do not recommend, however, working out in these pants. They are not sweat wicking and are too baggy for running, biking, etc. But I absolutely LOVE them for just taking it easy!

I bought a pair of joggers from Lulu about 3 years ago. I absolutely loved them and wore them constantly. Unfortunately, their time has come, which is why I wanted to buy a pair to replace them. These seemed to be the closest ones in style and in fabric. I was very confident when I first bought them not thinking I needed to try them on. Went home and realized they were way too tight around my thighs. However, they fit like a glove around my waist and made my butt look great! It looked like I was wearing leggings with loose calves (not a good look). I'm typically between a 4 and a 6 depending on the fit of the pant. I had bought the 6 wanting them to be comfy fitting. When I went back I tried the size 8 thinking maybe I needed to be forgiving. My disappointment grew. The size 8 was not much larger around the thighs yet was now loose around my waist. All I can say is these are not made for my body type. Sigh... Lulu! I just want to give you my money!! Bring back your older model. It's way better!

I saw similar joggers last year that unfortunately sold out before I had a chance to buy them. I love these pants and wish they were available year round. Having a yoga-pant jogger in my life is amazing!

I have the Align 2 pants in several colors and thought I’d try out these joggers. They just don’t thrill me like the Align 2s, my all-time favorite Lulu pants. The cuffs are too snug around my muscular calves and the pockets gap. Not my favorite Lulu pants. I got a 6 because I wanted a looser jogger look (usually wear a 4 in the Align 2). I’m petite 5’2” 135 lbs.

I'm really disappointed in these pants! I really wanted to like them but I had to return my first pair due to a small whole in the leg, only for another whole to show up in the leg on the new pant. I've only had the pants for 2-3 months and their quality is not good!
I wanted to really love these, but they just fell a little short. One of those instances where a curvier model would have been helpful.

I love these pants, but apparently pilling is a part of the package. I ordered a pair, experienced pilling right away and returned them, thinking I was unlucky and got a bad pair. Bought another, and these ones are pilling too after only a couple of washes and wears. I wash all of my aligns gently and generally don't have a problem, but these are just not working. My fabric shaver can only do so much. Really torn, because I love them, but if it's this bad now... what are they going to look like in a couple months?

Please make these a permanent item! I haven't washed them yet so I can't speak on the fabric if it's different than regular aligns. Fit-wise, they're perfect! Not too tight, not too lose, spot-on length, super soft, POCKETS! This is exactly what my closet has been missing.

I’m in love with these joggers. I want to wear them everyday, all day long. I’ve worn them to work, with heels out, and to veg out on the couch. BUT they’re already pilling and I’ve had them two weeks!! On the front of the pants too, not even the crotch area. I’ve noticed a couple areas of loose fabric near the stitching as well which is worrisome. They’re amazing pants, just wish they were holding up better!

i am a huge fan of the align pant, i own at least 20 pairs. i usually order a size 2 in the aligns, so i went with a 4 for these. (i am 5'7, 135 lbs) they definitely don't look like joggers, but i do like the way they fit. they are tight in all the right places, but a little bit of loose fabric in the knee/shin area. if you were after more of an actual jogger fit, i would recommend sizing up 2 sizes at least!

Love these - just ordered them in another colour. I sized up to an 8 to get the baggier fit. They're very thin and soft - but not thin in a bad way that makes them see through or cheap. They're just thinner than regular joggers but this is what I also love about them. I don't feel like I've "given up on life" when I wear these whereas I won't leave the house wearing other joggers.

I have been in love with the "Align" pants and crops since they were introduced. When Lulu came out with this jogger, I knew I had to have it! Love it - bought it in the black and the olive green color. They are so soft and comfy to wear, yet not frumpy looking. I am very slender so I went with my regular size 2 and they have the "jogger" fit - they are nice and slim throughout the butt/hips, but get a little looser around the thigh. If I were just to change one thing it would be to make them a little shorter! (I'm 5 feet tall for reference). Lululemon - please start making your most popular items in lengths! I know you offer complementary hemming, but it doesn't apply to more "complex" alteration items. Shorties need love too!!

When I saw this in the store, I was stoked. I love the material of my align leggings so I had to have the joggers. Pocket are always a yes from me! However, I've only worn these a handful of times and it is pilling around the front side of the pants especially around the pockets and the some areas of the seams are coming apart. BIG DISAPPOINTMENT.. I was so excited and I am yet to wash them cause I'm scared it will make the pants go into worse condition and I don't want to risk it. I don't know what to do. Align leggings were my fav and i was just so let down by the joggers. Sad.

The aligns are my favourite leggings and I was so excited when they came out with joggers. I love the fit of them and how flattering they are. I only wore them for a couple hours and after one wash, there is already piling on the leg and on the seams. Pretty disappointed

I was so excited to see these joggers on LLL. I love the Align Pant and having them made into jogger form seemed like an answer to my jogger problems. I'm not a fan of a baggy butt, so this jogger seemed like a blend of 2 great products together.
Love them. Fit is sort of a cross between a tight and a jogger. Fabric is delicious.

I love these pants! I bought them because I had knee surgery and I needed something that wouldn't put pressure on my knee. These were them! Thank you! I wear align pants and these were perfect for my recovery!!
These joggers are the best! I now own two pairs because I wear them multiple times/week. They are light weight, stylish and I receive so many compliments when I wear them. LOVE!

Love these. I have many pairs of the aligns and love that these joggers have pockets.
I have them in black and first time washed, they look so faded like I've had them for years... I followed the instructions and even washed with a few other LLL items so tiny load.

When these came out I was a little skeptical of how they would look but they look just as flattering as the align pants. I have 2 pairs (navy and black) and am disappointed I didn't order them in the dark adobe. I am hoping they come out with other colors like a slate grey or titanium. I practically live in joggers this season so I am completely obsessed! And I realize many people complain about the aligns pilling or coming apart (per reviews) but I can safely say I have never had a problem with them (except for normal wear that has accumulated over time and use). I have actually dried them in the dryer on low and it has never affected the fabric.

I loved these pants; they were exactly what I was looking for and the fabric is so soft! Unfortunately, they started to pill after 2 wears. I am beyond careful when caring for my workout gear and have never had the pilling issue before this purchase, although I've experienced many other quality issues with Lulu. I'm very disappointed and not sure if I'll be back.

I went up in size to get the bagginess in the pant, like others recommended. (I have very muscular legs so I was nervous about the pant fitting too tightly and not getting the loose fitting) While the material is amazing and super soft, the crotch had an awkward fit - it was very low and my crotch looked similar to a man's, I don't know how else to describe it. It looked better if I hiked the pant up to my belly button, but then it was too high of a waist. So sad these didn't work out for me... I am 5'6" 145 lbs with muscular legs/butt.

Amazing pants!! They are the comfiest and softest lulu pants I own! Definitely would encourage friends to buy them if they’re looking for some lounge pants. I love the high waist band and the thick cuffs at the ankles.

I sized up on these and LOVED the look, feel, fit, etc., however... they literally pilled the first day I wore them. Right on the front near the pocket. I didn't have anything near them that would make them pill in the way they did. Super disappointed with these.

I am unsure on the proper sizing for these pants, but I went with my normal 6 in LLL, I'm usually a small in brands, I do feel I could've sized down in these but I wasn't intending them for working out so I didn't want them too tight. They seriously feel like butter on my skin, I wear them SO MUCH. They're really cute and a nice change from regular tight leggings. Highly recommend but can't say how they are for a workout!

I love the fabric, fits my lean body perfectly, the pocket could be a little deeper to store my phone (play list) more securely, but its a minor thing as I don’t plan to run in the 3 pair I bought. These are my new go to for just about anything.

I ordered these joggers about a week ago and am very disappointed. I have never had problems with the quality of lululemon before and stand by the quality of all their clothes; but these joggers fell short. These pants are super soft but have such an awkward fit.....tight in thighs and baggy by the knees. They also pill unlike any other lulu I own. I have worn them only twice since receiving them and they are already starting to pill and haven't even been washed yet. Honestly, I just feel really disappointed and sadden by the quality of these pants.

I am a TTS 4 in Lulu pants (5'5", 120 lbs) and had to get a 6 for the fit as per the model. I just love these joggers; fit, feel, and durability (so far so good). Easily dressed up or down. I've ordered them in olive and now am adding black to my collection. I would love to see more colours in this pant!

These pants are great! I initially git the crop version since I'm only 5 feet but then ended up returning those and getting this full length version and the length and fir is just amazing! Super comfy and soft and stylish. Figure flattering-can be dressed up or down.
These pants are fantastic, so smooth and soft! They fit great, I took my usually size. I plan to wear them on an overseas vacation as they can be dressed up or down and are comfy as heck!

My absolute favorite pants. They fit true to size and feel amazing on my skin. I love the extra room around the knees and ankles. They look much nicer and more put-together than other joggers. Please make more!
Je suis extrêmement satisfaite de mon pantalon. Il est confortable, facilite les mouvements et très doux. Bref, je l’adore. Merci

I have a pair of joggers from lulu that I love. I love them so much I wanted another pair but those have been discontinued. I tried these but unfortunately like almost all lulu pants they are too tight in the thigh. I want joggers to be loose everywhere not loose all down the leg & clinging to my thighs. Super unattractive.

I have been on the search for the perfect joggers and I finally found them! They are super comfy and soft! I love that their a bit looser on the legs than leggings which makes them comfier to lounge in, but they still have a figure flattering look to them. I took the advice of others and ordered up a size - I normally wear a 4 in align leggings and got a 6 and it’s perfect! I’m going back for more colors!! Buy this now, you won’t regret it!

I love my Align leggings and am a sucker for joggers so was super excited when these came out. I'm between a size 4 and 6 so sized up to the 6 based on reviews. The size is great and they look super cute. However, because there is seam along the back with the pocket, the front of the pants CONSTANTLY folds forwards and it is super annoying (at least I assume the seam is causing this because my leggings do not fold). So I'm always having to adjust the waist which makes me less inclined to wear them.

These are amazing and I want to get one in EVERY color; so soft and comfy, total light and I am pretty sure I am worn them 7 days straight. I have lounged in them; so not working out in these; although I'm sure you could go to yoga or something. They are tighter on my booty and muscular thighs than typical joggers but I actually like it-- maybe size up if you are looking for something loose all around.

These joggers are the same material as the align leggings- so extremely buttery soft. I wear them sooo often. I am a size 4-6 in the leggings, got a 6 in the joggers. They are tight around the bum area but loose on the legs so they’re super comfy!! Highly recommend.

I just got these in the mail yesterday and was so impressed when I opened the package. The material is beautiful, sort of a step up from the regular Align material so it doesn't show ever bump. They are so comfortable and flattering. I can't wait to try them out in a yoga class! Now, which colour to get next :)

These are the most flattering joggers I've ever worn. I am curvy and athletic so I always worried about wearing sweatpants as they make your legs look larger but these joggers were so flattering! I am normally a size 6 or 8 in their regular leggings and i got these in an 8. I would not size up too much because even the waist in these are a bit looser than I expected. If you are in between sizes, i'd pick the larger size but I would not go up more than that. I am 5'4 and these are as long as my 7/8 leggings which are full length on me. I got the navy and I am already considering buying more colors!

I love the align pants, so when the joggers were introduced I was sold! They are a nice pant - very comfortable. However, size up! I usually wear an 8 in lulu and ordered a 10 in these. I like the fit but they're still fitted. If you want a real "jogger" look to them, I would recommend sizing up two sizes if possible.
I am 5 11 and I look so silly in these. Not flattering at all if you are tall, they hit at a very weird spot. LLL now markets to short women, just like most brands, booo.
I love these pants they are so comfortable! I recommend them to anyone who asks. I totally plan on getting more.

First off, I love all things "align" by Lululemon. And these pants are no different. I wear a 12 in their bottoms and I will say that I wish these were just a tad looser in the legs to be more of a true jogger. I still love them (and let's be honest, I'll likely buy another pair), but if I had my preference, they'd be just a tad looser. You could also size up to get this effect.

I LOOOOOVE these joggers sooo much. They look super sleek and stylish. I bought the black pair for myself a bit ago, in a size up so they wouldnt cling to my thighs, but the only issue is they started to pill on the bum area which just looks very unflattering now. They have only been washed once and worn a handful of times. I want to continue to love these pants but I am super disappointed as I expected higher quality for the price point :(

I was already a lover of the align pants ( have 5 pairs in various lengths/colors) and these joggers do not disappoint. They are so soft and comfortable. Softer than regular Aligns. Ordered my normal size 10 in True Navy and they fit TTS and the navy is a nice navy. Just ordered another pair in black! Some reviews suggest to size down so I guess it's all about how you like them to fit. Regardless, I am in love!
I am OBSESSED with these align joggers! As an avid lover of the regular align leggings, I was beside myself when I saw they made them in jogger form. My absolute new favorite pant. Run true to size.
These pants are perfect. So soft and comfortable, but extremely flattering. I cannot express how happy they make me. Lulu delivered on this one

I work at a gym and a girl I work with was telling me about the new Align joggers and after seeing her wear them I decided to order myself a pair. I have tiny ankles but relatively bulky thighs, so I sized up 2 sizes (from a 2 to a 6) and purchased a black pair. The pants themselves are super cute, with the flat pockets and thick ankle cuffs. However, they just didn't look and fit the way I wanted. Because I sized up so much, the waistband was a bit too loose for my liking, and then the thigh area had the tiniest amount of room, not exactly like a jogger. The length was good, but the overall look isn't what I wanted, so I ended up returning these pants.
Bought this in my TTS but decided to SIZE UP for a more comfortable and relaxed fit. The material iswhat you imagined it to be. Soft and smooth and lightweight. Highly recommended.

These joggers pill unlike any other align I own, and I have 4 other pairs. After the second wearing, I notice they had pilled all over the right hip area. Literally, the second wearing. They hadn’t even been washed! For $98, I feel ripped off.
Disappointed that lululemon has stopped making any pants in Tall/Long lengths! Only a few styles to choose from on their entire website. No selection :(
These joggers are a great addition! Sizing is what you’d expect. They can be dressed up or down. Not likely to wear to workout in, but great casual wear.

Bought one pair to try them out, was BLOWN AWAY, bought two more colors. These are by far, my favorite joggers, can't beat the feeling and look of these. I went with my usual size and fit perfectly. These keep me just as warm and are more comfy than sweatpants and they look better. I wear these all weekend now, doing errands and lounging, they are the best! Worth every penny, no regrets buying these babies!
These are my new favorites! So soft and comfortable, but flattering. Bought a pair as a gift for my sister and one for my daughter. Everyone loves them!

While I like the fit and feel of these pants, I have found the overall quality of the fabric to be subpar. I have owned them less than a month and the fabric on the legs is already wearing and pilling. They already look well worn in. This is only after barely a handful of washes. I hang to dry, wash delicate, cold water. I am extremely disappointed, especially since they are not cheap. Unlikely to purchase lulu pants moving forward after this experience.
I bought a black pair online and sized up one size. They were still ridiculously tight and not flattering! I would say these pants probably work best for the leaner body types. I returned them.

These align joggers are the best. I'm 5'3 and normally 115lbs and wear size 2.
I am 26 weeks pregnant and can still wear them.. I would love to wear them everyday =)

These are terrible..they are long enough for very short people only.. i’m 5’8 and these are like capris.. I think lululemon needs to start doing better and offering more options for their customer base! Very unhappy!

I absolutely LOVE these joggers! I don't usually look good in joggers as I have shorter legs since I'm 5'2, but the fit on these is amazing. Comfortable in the waist, fitting in the thighs and looser around the calves. I wear a 4 in the normal aligns and a 4 in these. I'm obsessed and will definitely be purchasing another pair in the future!

I’m not normally a “jogger” wearer, but the I was intrigued by the the waistband, as well as the Nulu material being utilized on this jogger. Based on friend recommendation, I sized up. They fit well in my size up. My true to size would have felt a tiny bit clingy on my thighs. I only wished the butt seem looked a little bit better. More colors please.

I bought two pair of these - one for my daughter and one for myself. I love the loose fit with the great yoga fabric - so not only can I wear them to yin or vinyasa - I can wear them to the market and take naps in them and maybe if I'm clever wear them to work....might be a stretch - BUT I would if I could. Fit perfect - soft, stay where they are supposed to. I'd like another please - (or 5)

Contrary to the well-known wisdom of sizing down for the Align pants, these pants fit better when sized up. They're incredibly comfortable, and offer the look of a jogger with the comfort of the align. I expect that eventually they will pill, but I love that they have pockets and you can't beat the comfortable waist band.
awesome material, so comfy. 5 ft 10 inch, 145lbs, size 8 fit great.
I love these pants!! And I’ve worn them almost everyday since I got them. I did size up as some of the comments suggested:)

Love these pants! They remind me sweatpants without the bulk...soft and it lays flat at the waist. It is perfect layer for the fall season. I wear 2/4 and decided on size 4; it is form fitting but not stuck to me. Definitely will be purchasing another pair/color.
Best joggers ever! It's like wearing pj's all day but not looking like it!
I really love these joggers. The waist lies flat and the fit is very flattering. The fabric is perfect for transition weather that isn’t hot and isn’t cold, but would work layered too.
I want these pants in every color!!! Love the fit and look of them!

Great jogger love the material but please note:
Im 5’1 and usually wear a 2 or 4 in lulu.
These were too long and per the recs in the reviews i sized up to a 6. Huge on me. And way too long.

I put these on and didn’t want to take them off. Very comfortable, and great fitting. The color was fun and different from my normal black. The pockets are good size and lay flat. Over all the pant is a 10!
Thank you LULULEMON.
My fav pant from lululemon thus far! Going to buy in every color!

I bought this joggers not so long ago, i think maybe two weeks ago because of a trip .I wanted something to be comfortable all day long, this pants are definitely comfortable and i love how they fit on me, i was actually considering buying these in black, but i must say that the quality it is not good , i mean for the amount of money you pay for this it did not even lasted a month without pilling, the bottom stitches are coming off so i assumed these are not going to last me to long.

If you are fan of the Align leggings, then may fall in love with these joggers just like I have. The fit is great, they are perfect for wearing to and from the gym or for running errands around town.
I have already ordered a pair as a Christmas present for my sister and I can't wait to order more for myself!

Love these pants! After reading reviews, I ordered up as suggested. I wear a 6 in my align crops, and an 8 in most other Lulu pants. I got a 10 in these and they're perfect. I wouldn't mind the waist being just a touch tighter, but it doesn't impact the performance of the pants.

I did what all the reviews said and sized up. I wear size 4 studio dance, size 6 in all crops/tights, and decided on a size 10. They're PERFECT. The fabric is so soft and I would wear them all day, every day if I could.

I was uncertain about this style, but I'm so happy I purchased these. For reference I am 155 pounds - 32 inch waist - 40 inch hips - 5'5" - muscular build, the size 12 fits perfect and I normally wear a size 8 in bottoms. This is a great style for relaxed weekend clothing without wearing sweatpants. Considering buying another pair!
I’m short and they fit me perfect.

Hmmm. I guess just really want the naked buttery skim top of the align pants (check!) on a pair of warm, fleece lined old school sweats (nope). They looks like your old school sweat pants, but it really is at most a touch thicker (maybe?) than the classic align pants. I’m not saying I feel misled or anything, I just jumped to conclusions based on the fit. Overall I like the color and the waist is what I wanted, so I’ll keep them. I just had it in my head that the legs would be made of a slightly thicker fabric with that sort of fleecy material on the inside to make it warmer.

I purchased the navy joggers in my usual size 6, and as previous reviews mentioned, they run quite small. The fabric is buttery soft and they are a dream to wear; however, I tore the tag off of the pants out of excitement, and now wish that I could exchange for a size 8 in order to achieve the loose look as shown on the website. All in all, a great pant but listen to what everybody is saying and size up! I am 5'8" and 130 lbs for reference.
I wear these every opportunity I can and everywhere I can. I want these in every colour. I'm curvy and I sized up to get the baggy look seen on the model. I found my usual size (10) was tight.

I LOVE THESE JOGGERS!! Before purchasing, I read the reviews and although they were mixed I decided to size up from my regular size for more of a jogger look. (Usually an 8, went up to a 10). I'm so happy I did! They're perfect. They aren't super tight but not baggy at all. Great for class, causal, and for me, even work! I'd recommend to size up if you're looking for a more relaxed fit.
So comfortable, perfect fabric and cut. These are now my everyday pants.

I love the Align Joggers because they have the same super soft Nulu fabric as the Align leggings, but they offer a more relaxed fit.
The waistband is awesome-doesn’t roll down and stays in place.
I always size down in the Align leggings, but I sized up in the joggers after reading reviews...and I’m glad I did. These do run small.
I will definitely be ordering more colors because I absolutely LOVE these pants!
It’s the align fabric but in a little loose fit. They’re my new favorite daily pant. They still wear well in full work outs and dry quickly for after work out errands.

I've been on the search for some joggers that fit a bit more like leggings. I've.bought a couple pairs from other brands but have been disappointed. They're either not flattering or the material is not to my liking. But when I saw the align joggers, I knew I had to get them! They're everything I was looking for! I'm usually a size 2 in the align leggings, I decided to size up to a size 4 since all the reviews said so but I found myself exchanging them for a size 2. I like the tighter fit since I found them more flattering on me. They're legit perfect. Hoping this becomes a permanent item and more colors get released!

I am 5'2 and 115 pounds and normally wear a size 2 in the align leggings but sized up because of previous reviews. I ordered both a 4 and 6. The 6 fit better in the sense of a jogger feel BUT it was way too loose around my waist. The 4 fits a little tighter around my thighs and butt however overall still fits pretty well. I have only worn the joggers once but so far I am very happy with my purchase and will want more colors!!
The PERFECT mix between a comfy plant and the soft, flattering ALIGN joggers. Absolutely recommend for leisure-wear and work wear as a personal trainer.

These pants are so comfy! I am normally a 2 in most pants (workout and leisure) at Lulu and I got a 4. They fit snug, but not like leggings. They're just how I wanted them to fit. They are SO SOFT and SO STRETCHY!
I highly recommend them and I love that they have pockets!
Saw these on line and knew I had to try them. Arrived next day and love them!! They fit perfect, feel great and they are now my new favorites.

I've had these for less than a week, not even washed yet, and they've already started pilling badly. Overall so disappointed with the longevity of these joggers. I was really loving them but for the price they really should be more durable!
My long search for the perfect pair of black joggers is over. All of the joggers I've purchased have been too long, too tight, too baggy. But these Align joggers are *just* right.
Just like regular Align’s these are buttery soft, but just a bit too thin for what I was looking for. Was hoping for a thicker warm Jogger.
Love these pants, theyre a perfect mix of a legging and a jogger! I am so happy with them and will be getting in more colours
So i normally go with the aligns but wanted to mix it up. These joggers did not disappoint!
These pants are not joggers. That being said, I like them and decided to keep them. They are simply a slight baggy align pant, so if you like the regular align, you'll like these.

Completely obsessed! Two of my favorite things (Align material and joggers) combined into one. Definitely one of my favorite lulu items ever! I ordered the black and burgundy but want every color in both lengths. Do yourself a favor and splurge on these! I found the fit to be similar to the align leggings. I am 5’4”, 140lb, athletic build and ordered my usual size 6.
Most comfortable sweat pants/joggers I own!!

I’m not sure how they’ll hold up, but I literally wore them 5 days in a row last week. SO comfortable and cute! They’re not frumpy at all. Hubby loves them! I ordered one size up from my align pant size. I’m also short- 5’1”, so length wasn’t an issue for me!

I really like the Align Leggings, so I was super jazzed about these Align Joggers. Unfortunately, they do not fit like a 'jogger' but rather just a loose legging. If I would have gone up like two more sizes, maybe it would have worked...but then the waist wouldn't have worked. These were a major bummer b/c the Align fabric is so soft. These unfortunately went back.
I took the recommendation to size up. It was right on, if I wouldn’t have they wouldn’t fit. The fabric is great.

These joggers are pretty perfect! Love the lightweight comfie fabric and the pockets are great. The length is also just right. Any longer and they'd be too long but for taller folks, you might want to make a long length version. They are awesome for travel but also great for lounging around at home. I hope you keep these around for a long time and please make more colors. We could use a dark grey!

SIZE DOWN. These pants would be so much greater if they did not stretch out so much while wearing. I got these in navy and black. I worked out in them and by the end of my workout, they were 2 sizes too big. Usually I have a problem with things fitting my butt well but not my waist, but by the end of the day they were too big all over. I paid too much for these to get so big so fast. However, they are great for doing things that don't require much moving.
I’m 5’9, 140 lbs and usually wear size 6 in lulu bottoms. I got the 6 and 8 and kept the 8. They’re so so comfortable I never want to take them off! I wish they were maybe an inch longer.
I love these pants! So comfortable and stylish. They fit like a slim sweatpants but look much more put together. I wear the Align tights in 6 and bought these in 6 and fit perfectly.
These are hands down the most comfortable and flattering joggers I’ve own. The band is perfect, it doesn’t dig in on my waist. And of course nulu. So soft and comfy. I got the crops too!

I am in love with these joggers! I am 5'4" and 120 pounds and normally a size 4 in Lululemon bottoms, but I sized up to a 6 to achieve the same look as the model. I have larger hips and thighs than the model but I found that the fit is still great at a 6. I have short legs (25" inseam) and I have finally found a pair of joggers that aren't too long for me. I haven't had any issues will pilling and I have had them for about 3 weeks. I have been wearing them to run errands and do some light workouts. My only complaint is that they attract lint and pet hair like nobody's business but it's worth it for the comfort.
These are the perfect addition to my align collection! The fit is amazing and the fabric and feel is exactly like that of the align leggings. Everyone needs these in their life.

These pants are so amazing! But they do not fit me well. I am 5'9 and to wear these as pants, not capris, I have to pull them down, which leaves a stretched-look from my knees down. They look much better on my shorter friends!
These joggers are great! I bought two blacks, one green, and one navy! They are similar to last years ready to rulu ....they do run small. I am a 2 in everything but these a 4!

These pants are the most comfortable joggers I own by far. I will definitely buy more. I am addicted to the comfort and could wear these every day. The only reason I took off one star is the fit is a little weird. If you are curvy, I would size up. I usually wear a 6 but a 6 in these fit like some other reviews said, fitted but with weird cuffs. I have a bum from weighted squats so I sized up to an 8 and they fit much better. I wouldn’t do a gym session in these, but they’re perfect for a walk or hike. My new favorite to and fro pants!

I was so looking forward to these high-waisted, slim joggers but was immediately disappointed when I tried them on. They are so tight - if you want the look of the model, you'll need to size up a few. Also, they aren't really that high of a waist and the waist is so thin that it doesn't even feel controlled.

I ordered a size up after reading reviews and regret it. They are not really designed to fit loose so getting a larger size just looks odd on my frame. Lots of wrinkles in the crotch area, and just overall not very flattering.
I absolutely love these !!!!

Fit well, very flattering, same nice fabric as the align.
Fits true to size.

I am absolutely in love with this pair of pants. I think these pants were only released in the past 2 weeks and I have 2 pairs. They are form fitting like the align leggings but a little loser around the waist and calf area. These are perfect for a workout, running errands, or chilling around the house. I hope they release a grey pair soon!

My usual Align and "looser-style" pant size from lulu is 6. I am an 8 in the classic luxtreme/luon, etc tights. I went with 6 and love them. They are slightly more fitted in the bum and thigh than on the model (though less so than the Align legging would be) but are loose in the calves.
I’ve had issues with Aligns and loose-fit pants stretching out over time, so I’m hoping these won’t get too baggy if they happen to stretch a bit.
A lot of people are saying size up, but I think it depends on how you’d like the pants to fit. Keep in mind, they may stretch with wear!

Amazing pants, the softest material is used in the Align pants and the joggers are just as comfy as the others. It is a very fitted jogger pant so you may want to size up if you are looking for a looser fit. You could live in these pants, just saying!

The waist band on these is just not quite right. I LOVE my align leggings but these ones seem to be thicker in the waist band and dip down a little in the back. They cut you off right at the wrong place on the waistline.I am petite and these ride up very easily so I cant imagine if you were taller! I do like the idea of them but the waist band needs to be fixed.
These are phenomenal! I did have to size up so they looked like joggers and not oddly cuffed leggings though.

I feel like the reason why people are saying they don't like these pants is because the people are on the taller side. I am quite short (5 feet 1 inch) so I find these to be a great fit. I have been on the hunt to find a pair of joggers that fit me and I have now found them with these pants. I find most joggers do not fit because I have muscular legs and I am not tall but these ones are a great fit. I will definitely be purchasing these pants in more colours.

Kind of surprised by these reviews, I found these to be amazing. Most of the people who complained were because they were too tall but I have to disagree here, I'm 5'8 , 141 lbs and I have muscular legs and they look amazing and super comfortable. I'll usually between size 4 and size 6 in lulu , and I went with a 6 and its tight on my legs but loose on my waist which I like. I would recommend these to anybody. Great for lounging, or even working out( lifting weights).

I am 5'8", 135 lbs, a 26.5" waist and have slim legs. I originally purchased these pants in a size 4 but they felt too fitted/naked, so I exchanged them for a 6. After speaking with a couple of representatives, I decided to exchange them for a 4 again because I was worried the 6 would stretch out once I started wearing them and the pants don't have a draw string to tighten later. The size 4 that I exchanged these for seem a bit looser in the leg. The small inside pocket showed on both the size 4 and 6. I believe this is because of the thinner fabric (which by the way will really show your panty lines so wear a thong or now show underwear).

I bought the Run Rulu Run pants last year based on a friend's recommendation and loved them. I work from home most days and wanted some comfortable but cute pants for the day so I wanted another pair similar to the Run Rulu for those days. I decided to try the Align Jogger and I'm glad I did. I bought the navy and just wore them this past weekend for the first time. We were traveling and they were perfect travel pants and though they are casual they looked great with a sweater and athleisure sneakers. We did a 5 mile charity walk and it turned out I forgot my running tights so I ended up wearing these joggers and they performed just as great and the pockets were great for holding my phone. My only tiny complaint is that they are high waisted and the waist tends to roll down when I'm sitting. But, I have a pretty short torso so that's not uncommon for high waisted pants for me.

I was so so excited about these, because I love the align legging and was looking for a relaxed fit option. The align jogger does offer the best of both worlds here, but also comes with some disappointments and difficulty -- quality and size.

I have several Align pants in different colors because I love them so much. When I tried these on, I fell in love. It has the same amazing feel of the Aligns with a comfort feel to relax in on the weekends. They're so cute. However, these actually had pilling on the first day. I couldn't believe it! I've read about pilling issues on the Aligns but I've only seen minor pilling on one of my Aligns, nothing noticeable. However, it hurts that I paid this much for joggers and there is major pilling on one of the legs.

I have no idea how people are fitting in to this jogger. I will say the fabric is beyond, and i LOVE the align leggings but the jogger is a big miss as far as fit goes. I wear a size 2 in the align leggings. I tried on the size 4 in this jogger and it was so tight on my butt, hips and thighs, but perfect around the knee and down. the length was perfect as well. but it was so unflattering on the top of the pant. for reference i am 5'3", 115 lbs. I do lift weights so i have more bulk in my hips and butt for my size, so perhaps if you have a smaller frame these will work. So sad these didn't work for me.

These joggers are exactly what I have been wanting in a pair of pants! I highly recommend sizing up- I personally had to go up 2 sizes for them to fit the way they do in the pictures. I'm 5'9", 170 lbs, an 8 in almost everything Lulu, and I went with a 12 in these, because I wanted the looser fit that joggers tend to have. I was worried the waistband would be too big, but it's not at all and exactly what I was looking for. They are more comfortable than regular sweatpants but don't make you look like a slob! 10/10 would recommend!!

I think this is the first pair of pants that I can officially say I am completely in love with! I got these in sz 4 (I am 5'1", 97lb for reference). I do recommend as the other reviewers mention to size up 1 size. I tried on a size 2 and they were really tight around the butt and thighs. I feel like joggers should be a little on the loose side though. I asked the workers in store and they said if you look at the model on the website, she is wearing it looser so I could size up as long as the waist fits. But they said they have seen people wear regular size if they want a little more form fitting. These are high waisted if you like to wear a crop top or sports bra working out this is perfect.

These joggers are everything you would want in an align jogger, with one fatal flaw--they are more like capri pants for those with longer legs. I am 5"7, 115 lbs and usually a size 4. I tried on a size 6 with recommendations from others to size up (the 28" inseam). The pants fit like great, loose-ish sweatpants but are way too short. They would be great if you were looking for capri pants, and awful if you were looking for full length pants.

I have loved the Align leggings and thought I would try these out.
They are not sweatpants- I have an athletic build-they fit tight to body and booty and are a little more relaxed in the lower leg.
They are comfortable, soft and light weight.
I taught in them, had lunch and watched a sporting event in the Florida heat and they looked and performed great.
Do size up unless you want them to be fitted

I didn't believe the other reviews, and wish
I had. Love these, so soft and flattering but
I am exchanging for the next size for a looser fit

it's not often I buy full priced clothing, but this pair of joggers are totally worth the full price before it sells out! Not only are they super flattering and slim cut in the legs, they are soooooo smooth. You can literally wear this jogging, yoga, at the office, to sleep.

I'll start by saying these are a really awesome jogger. I love my aligns, (other than the fact that I find the black fabric pills, none of the other colors though?!) and these joggers are GREAT. I am halfway through my pregnancy - so obviously I was planning on sizing up. However, I'm usually a 4 in all lulu leggings and between a 4 and 6 in the tops, and I ended up sizing up to a size 10 in these. I would possibly even need a bigger size for later in my pregnancy. They'd probably fit more true to size for someone on the slim side, but I definitely have a bigger/muscular leg and didn't want them to be super skinny in the leg on me. My only issue is...for the gals that are usually a size 10-14, what size will they get?! Regardless, I'm super happy with them and how comfy they are on my growing belly! For reference, I'm 5'6, 138 lbs pre-pregnancy (150 lbs currently).

These joggers are amazing! They fit like leggings from the thighs up. And not too much looser than that everywhere else. I love the slim design and of course the Align fabric is so soft. The hand pockets on each side are flat, big and barely noticeable. There's a pocket in the back. I feel like there are pockets everywhere! I was going to size up, per the reviews, but didn't. I'm very glad I sticked to my usual Align size because they fit me TTS exactly like the Align leggings. I wear a size 4 in Align, got a size 4 in the joggers and the waist is exactly the same. I bought them in black, and will definitely get another color. I'm 5'4" and they hit my ankle.

I wear size 12 in everything lululemon and have bought joggers from them before. I am an avid fan of the Align pant and was way too excited when I got the email for the Align Jogger, and I ordered them right away. I was pretty bummed to find out that they don't fit like a jogger if you buy your actual size. They are quite tight on my thighs and only slightly loose around my calves. I'm 5'10" and the length is above my ankles, similar to the normal Align pant length. If you want a jogger fit, size up... if you can that is.

These pants are ALMOST perfect. I saw the reviews online regarding sizing and decided to try on in store instead of ordering online. I wear a size 6/8 at Lululemon (5'7 145lbs athletic build) and these were perfect in the size 10 although I liked the 12 as well. Unfortunately I don't think anyone over a size 8/small 10 could fit these pants as they were intended to be worn. The 10 on me fit fairly similar to the model. No one else has mentioned it but the double seam on the inside of the leg rubs slightly for me. Having said all of that I have lived in these pants since I got them. For me they are right in between a legging and sweat pant and don't look frumpy. They are perfect with a hoodie and I've also worn them with a t-shirt and leather jacket/jean jacket. I'm already looking forward to the 2nd version of these pants as I think they'll make them slightly larger through the leg so people can take their regular size. I'm looking at the other colours now and think I may need a second pair to go with my black ones.
I may never take these off.

So happy Lulu released these! These are so incredibly comfortable and flattering. They are exactly like the aligns but provide a more relaxed fit and in jogger style. As for the sizing I'm 5'7 and 125lbs and went with a size 2 (my normal size in align pants). Although they fit great, I might consider sizing up from what you wear in the normal Align leggings if you want a more relaxed fit as they are pretty fitted.

Let me start by saying that when I first saw these online, I already had a picture in my head of how I wanted them to look like on me. Personally, I wanted a tighter fit around my quads and hamstrings and loose around my calves. Therefore, I ordered my regular size (6) and a size down (4). Both arrived in the mail today and I just tried them on and OMG... these look exactly how I envisioned them in my head. *I'm still trying to decide which size to keep since they both have slightly similar fit*. With that being said, if you want them to look like the model wearing the olive green pants, then I'd highly suggest to size up 1-2 sizes. Finally, I highly recommend these joggers, the fabric is soft, they fit beautifully and I find that the "V" in the back makes the booty look nice. I'm considering getting every color in these pants, and hope that they come out with a camo print soon! Also, I'm crossing my fingers that they will look the same after a few wears and washes.
Please never get rid of these, Lululemon!!

I love this very stretchy fabric, and the cut of these joggers. What really sets them apart is the waist: it is not draw-string but a much more flattering constructed waist. Fit is small; I usually take a 4 but the 6 was perfect. I’m 5’6” 125 lbs.

Joggers usually fit me a little too baggy, but these are perfect. I LOVE the regular align pants/crops and wear a 2 but I did size up to a 4 in these. The size 2 fit but they were a little more like leggings (like you could see the pocket outline) rather than joggers. I will definitely be buying these in other colors! I am 5' 6" 115 lbs for reference.

I have been searching FOREVER for high waisted joggers that wouldn't add layers and layers on my stomach. The waist is super flattering, and best of all, the pockets aren't made with redundant fabric, so they lie flat!! I'm buying as many colors as possible.

These joggers are amazing but you definitely will want to size up unless you want them to be fitted joggers----which then feel like leggings. I sized two sizes up to get some bagginess in the legs but still fitted around the butt. They are perfect to wear as a cute casual outfit or more comfy and loungewear. Great purchase!
Ordered in my true size 6 (I'm a smallish size 6, more like a 4/6). Fits very snug all the way to the knee (like a legging) and then just slightly loose below the knee. Very awkward and unflattering.

Saw them online and did a double take. Ordered immediately. Nulu....perfect. Jogger...perfect. I initially ordered a size up from align pant to a 6 but exchanged in store for an 8. Sized up twice to get the fit the like model for olive green and more of a drop crotch look.

I just received these joggers. They fit perfectly!! They are super soft and comfy. Not only do they feel extremely comfortable, but they can be dressed up or worn casually. They fit true to size for me. I’m 5’6” and at 115 lbs I usually wear size 6.
I just might have to order other colors! I love them!!! They will be perfect for travel too!

I'm 5'3 and originally purchased a size 4 which is the size I usually take in Lululemon joggers... I ended up exchanging them for a size 6 which is the size I wear in the original Align leggings. Staff at the store said that some clients are sizing up, so you may want to try them on in store or be prepared to exchange your size if it doesn't fit. Aside from that, on my frame these pants are absolute perfection. Fitted but not tight, slightly high waisted, and the perfect length to wear full length or bunch up to just below the knee for a more cropped look. The fabric is buttery soft and they have front pockets that don't look bunchy. I want them in every color. <3
Bought these in my TTS 4, I am 5'2 110 pounds. They are super comfortable, a great length and a nice change from wearing tights.

I'm 5'8, 140 pounds, wear a 6 in wunder unders and an 8 in most not tight pants. Got an 8 in these, and while they are comfortable, they are quite fitted, and they are too short. They need to be a couple of inches longer to sit right. Material is awesome though, and the high waist is nice. If they were longer and slightly more relaxed in the hips, I would keep them. They' going back.
These are my favorite tights for running & for yoga. They fit like a glove & basically fit like a second (comfortable!!!) skin. I highly recommend them!!!!

Review_Text: I bought these for my sister - 150$ taxes included for a pair of leggings, it was a splurge but I know she loves this store. However, I'm very disappointed to see that they are absolutely not worth that kind of money. Even though I bought them in her usual size (she has other Lululemon leggings), she told me that they don't stay in place and that they show sweat EVERYWHERE, even though she's not the biggest sweater. How embarrassing for her.
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text:
I will start by saying that I wanted to purchase some Lululemon leggings for running and was not sure where to start. You can read a million reviews that just leave you more confused than before you started. I am currently about 5'9", 165 lbs and carry my extra weight in my midsection. I purchased one each of 4 different styles - Fast and Free, Pace Rival, Speed Up, and Speed Wunder Under. I bought a size 10 in all four styles. Currently, I run about 2-4 miles every other day. I have rotated through all four styles multiple times to give them a fair shot. I have followed washing instructions and all have held up so far. For all four styles, the waistband mostly stays in place. They all develop some amount of wrinkling behind the knee but that goes with the territory of running and the movement of that joint. After reading reviews about sweat showing through most styles, I intentionally only selected patterned colors.
Of the four styles purchased, these "Fast & Free 7/8 Tight II *Nulux 25" come in third place for me. The fabric does stretch out a little. They still stayed up and in place, but potentially with more use they might be too loose. If you are someone who falls more in between sizes, I would maybe go with the lower, but for me I would not have wanted to go a whole size down. The other 3 styles have a zippered back pocket. These for whatever reason do not have a zipper there. I will never be able to trust running with a key there. For that reason, these are not practical for outdoor runs for me which is depressing for the price point and purpose for which I bought them. The fabric definitely provides the naked sensation. Some people might love this, but for me makes me feel slightly insecure.
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: I love how it fits, high waist, 25” length, and hugging sensation, but after few washes, you lose the hugging sensation. I have couple of other colors in Fast and Free, and the older ones are definitely loose. Wish it kept its shape.
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: I love these leggings. They fit true to size. They hold you in perfectly. However, I got the aqua color and I was so disappointed that sweat shows. I’m training for a 5K run and I would be so embarrassed to have sweat stains in public. I guess I’ll have to stick to black ones!
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: I only buy running tights and I have to say these here are the best ones yet. The fit is awesome as they hug in all the right places. In the past, most pants have been too tight in the thighs but not tight enough throughout the waist and lower stomach. These fit evenly all across the board for me and I hope they stick around. They are very light and I feel as if I'm wearing nothing at all. I also love the colors. Waiting for one in the dark plum and the cola. HOWEVER, I really wish Lulu would make the printed ones WITHOUT the white lining. I don't see the benefit in doing this whatsoever. The colors spread and lose the richness when the fabric expands.

Defiently would not recommend buying these to run in, or really at all. I hope they can re do these leggings and come up with a better way to get them to keep shape.

Review_Text:
I've waited for several wears and washes to review, and I have been washing according to instructions (only wash with like fabrics and line dry). The first couple wears were really good, the leggings fit well, but after several washes and wears, the leggings feel bigger. They are looser in the waist and crotch. I did try on a size smaller than what I purchased at the store and they were uncomfortably tight, but I'm wondering if I should have sized down given how big they feel now. I'm disappointed that such an expensive pair of leggings has failed to maintain its size.

On the positive side, the fabric is very nice - soft and buttery. The sweat-wicking ability is OK, not great. The pockets are a great size and comfortably hold phone, keys, etc.

Review_Text: First off, I honestly don't understand any of the negative reviews of these leggings regarding the fit. They fit true to size for all of my other lulu leggings. They never slip off of me or feel loose at the waist after wash. Just make sure to let them fully air dry before putting them on. Otherwise, you'll stretch out the fabric and then they will end up feeling a bit looser. I love that the waistband has seriously so many pockets to hold small items like keys, hair ties, etc. But they snatch the waist!!! love! I also love the deep side pockets on both legs, deep enough to fit my iphone 7 plus comfortably. The fabric is fantastically thin/lightweight but compressive and not cheap feeling at all. I will warn you that the lighter colors do show some cellulite and possibly underwear lines, but that's just a minor misgiving. I have 4 pairs of these pants (3 are the reflective) and they are my favorite, go -to leggings for HIIT, lifting, walking, hiking, all. My only gripe would be the price!

Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: I want to love them, I really do... These are my first pair of lululemon and honestly might be my last. I decided to treat myself and went to a store looking for a pair of leggings that would be great for running as I train for my second half marathon next month. The gal working recommended these for running, as they are lightweight. It is true, I liked how comfortable and breathable they are and I took them out for a quick 4 miler the next day and I was pleased! I hand washed them and let them air dry. I put them on for another workout, and they are loose! I was tugging them up constantly and they didn't fit or feel as great as they did the first time. Disappointing for a purchase at this price point, for sure. I'd expect the fabric elasticity to hold up a lot better.
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: I was super excited when I first purchased these, I love the material, the pockets, the fit, etc! I purchased the plain black and quickly bought the grey camo because they quickly became my new favorite style of pants HOWEVER, after only a couple of washes the waist stretched out significantly and are not as fitted as they were when I first purchased them. (I know this is normally the case for leggings) but the amount that they stretched out did not seem normal compared to other lulu leggings I have. Another thing I was extremely disappointed with was the stitching on the pants has come undone in many places on the pants. The thread is constantly hanging somewhere and I have to trim it off or else it obviously gets longer. (For both the black and the camo.) Super unhappy with these:(
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: Love this silver/sage color! These are probably my favorite pants, in any length.
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: These are my absolute favorite leggings. Super durable material, pockets, love the raw hem. Just wish they’d bring back reflective dots :(
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: The fabric feels like luxtreme...which I don’t wear because they fall down while I am moving. I thought they were more like the align pant. The cut is nice though. I wish LLL would make more leggings in Luon.
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: I bought 2 pairs. Initially, these are a great fit- snug and feels great during work outs. But after a couple of uses, material becomes loose on the top and the bottom around the ankle. I had to constantly pull the pants up at the wrist during my work out. I bought the 2nd pair in hopes it might have just been the first but unfortunately, same thing happened.
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: Les meilleurs leggings! Je les adore, c’est vraiment comme une deuxième peau. J’aime aussi les différentes couleurs. J’ai pris ma grandeur habituelle et c’était parfait
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: I have owned these pants for two months and I noticed the seams came undone last I washed them. I have worn them maybe every other week and washed in cold water on gentle, line dried. The fit is perfect, but at this price point, they are poor quality. I have worn them for travel more than at the gym. Sitting on airplanes shouldn't have this effect on leggings. Dissapointed at best by the quality of the seams. I won't be able to wear any longer as I don't want ripped pants while out - feeling frustrated and better off with a sports brand vs. athlesiure.
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: Unsure what happened with the quality of these leggings. I'm currently on my 4th return of these. The first one had a black line running up the right leg, the second had a hole in the waist band, the third one had a seam come undone after washing it once without wearing. I was talked into returning the 3rd for another pair and once again a seam came undone after washing it once.
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: I tried these on at the store and the ankle length bagged at my ankles (size 4). The assistant told me my 5'2" height was too short for the longer leggings. So I tried the cropped and they fit great (I thought) until I worked out at the gym and the the knees started to bag. I wore them twice and they are still bagging. For $118, I expected that they wouldn't bag, I should have taken them back but I love the color and their softness.
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: I was very satisfied with these leggings at first. The 25" inseam is perfect if you're in the 5'2-5'4 range and are trying to achieve that elusive 7/8 look. The Nulux material is lightweight, super smooth, and cool to the touch. I prefer this pair to the reflective version because they look cleaner. There isn't much compression, but your butt will still look amazing and your legs nice and slim in these. I've always read reviews about the seams coming undone on Lululemon pants without really thinking too much of it because I haven't experienced it on other pairs (that are available at a much! lower price point than these). But after wearing these ~1x/week for a few weeks and NEVER putting them in the dryer, the dreaded Lululemon curse was bestowed upon me at last! First a little thread poked out before a cycling session, and I didn't think much of it until before I knew it, all of the thread used on the top part of a seam became unraveled with no end in sight! It's such a shame that these leggings feel and look great, but you really just can't justify the added cost when the price per wear (before they fall apart right before your eyes) is so high.
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: I like that they took the reflective dots off the bottom of these tights. I wear them everywhere now.
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: I have many, many pairs of Lululemon leggings, and they're all so beautiful and flattering on the body. I bought this pair in Golden Lime and it was no exception. It hugged my legs and showed off my leg muscles beautifully, and the colour was so bright and fun for summer. I am very comfortable in them and I love the pocket on the side. The cuff of the leggings are seamless, which I thought was rather weird, but it's not a huge problem. For me, the biggest problem with this pair of leggings is that they pilled after the very FIRST wear. Again, I own many pairs of Lulus, and I know that some materials are very delicate and need some special attention, so I made sure that when I was wearing these ones, I tried not to sit too much and I made absolute sure that I wasn't rubbing the pants on anything. It was just a day at work and I tend to be on my feet most of the time. I also HANDWASH all my Lulus's inside out in cold water, and then lay them flat to dry on a polished marble surface. There was absolute no explanation as to why this pair pilled. I have been very careful with my other pairs and take such good care of them, that none of the other pairs have pilled on me, so when these Fast and Free Tights pilled so badly on the back, I was absolutely shocked. At this price point, no Lululemon clothes should ever be pilling, especially when I am taking such good care of them. I am thoroughly disappointed because I love this colour so much and have nothing else like them, but the pilling on the back is so bad that I am embarrassed to wear them again :(
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: I absolutely loved these pants, unfortunately I am slightly disappointed. I have only wore these pants a few times to the gym. I wash them and air dry them but for some reason I went to put them on to go to the gym and I have a small hole on my leg that almost looks like it was burnt. I'm not sure if I got a defective pair however this was very disappointing.
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: I had these pants for only two months before they ripped in the knee, and Lulu said that there was nothing that they could do to repair or replace them, because this does not fall within their "customer service promise". Since they are a unique material, I am having trouble finding a tailor that can fix them as well. I have other pants from here that have lasted me 5+ years, which is why I have no issue paying the high price for this brand. Unfortunately, this pant and has not delivered the same level of quality. It is a shame, because I initially thought they were a great running pant and was even considering a 2nd pair.
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: size down! I normally wear size 2, but I got size 0 on this one, and it fits perfect!
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: These tights make a hot workout bearable and I definitely won’t return them. But, since they are so thin, they show EVERYTHING in the belly section, so I definitely don’t feel as confident in my post pregnancy body and wear tops that cover though. Please note that it is not that they didn’t fit, anything looser would have fallen down.
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: best leggings! great for workouts and lounging around. have a tie at the waist and never slip!
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: These pants are so comfortable. I wore them to a warm yoga class and they were perfect. I also love that the high rise waistband didn’t roll down at all. Some of my other pants I’m constantly yanking up the band and I didn’t have to do that with these at all.
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: I splurged on these after trying so many different training leggings on. The material is noticeably softer than the others, which I loved. They are so comfortable to walk, run or work-out in and the pockets are great for holding items on-the-go.
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: I haven’t had the sweaty issue that others reported or maybe I haven’t noticed, but these pants have all he pockets I need for running and training and I love the fabric. They don’t fall down no matter what the activity and they are insanely light that I can wear them out in the heat to my cold gym. If lulu makes the crop style without the reflectors they are mine. If you’re on the fence about buying these, go for it. Best running/training pants I have had in years.
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: These are the 1st pair of tights that I own. Never could swallow spending $100 on a pair of pants but my very nice Aunt bought them for as a birthday gift (she swears by them). At first they were great. Love the fit and feel but after wearing them several times I noticed them getting looser in the crotch and around my ankles. They are tight around my calf but the lower down my leg they really stretch out. Not sure if this is normal I would hope not especially for the price.
Item_Name:
Fast and Free Tight II 25"
Non-Reflective Nulux

Review_Text: Love these new legging tights! Color is awesome fit is true to size. Already received multiple complements.

Fast and Free Tight II 25"

Review_Text:
I FELT IN LOVE WITH COLORS, THE GREEN AND THE BLUE.

Review_Text: J'adore ce leggings, je le recommande fortement,,

Review_Text: Great fit, amazing fabric that moves with you. No sagging, shifting or riding up. Great for runs or squats.
